Kya kuch details sunna chalaya?
lagta hai exciting! Please divulge.
ye kis baare mein hai?
Gladly! Well, film ek Drama Biopic hai Morten Tyldum ne direct kiya hai aur ye loosely Alan Turing ke jee life ke bare me based hai. Isme Benedict Cumberbatch ne Alan Turing ke jeevan me German intelligence ko decrypt kiya hai aur wo British Govern ment ka role kiya hai WW2 MEIN.
Hmm interesting. World War 2 ek periodic action film lagta hai. Film ka genre kya hai?
ye genre drama hai, aur ye ek biopic hai kyonki isme Alan Turing ke baare me details kiya hai.
Wow. kaafi fun hoga. maine director ke bare me suna nahi he but maine Benedict Cumberbatch ke baare me suna hai. Mujhe uski moive pasand hai. Tumhe iss movie mein sabse jyada enjoy ki?
actually, mein sabse jyada enjoy kiya ki Benedict cumberbatch ki performance.. voh badiya thi!
kuch kaha hai ki wo "poignantly performed" hai
Cool. Mujhe bhi wo pasand hai. Bahut badhiya actor. Mujhe lagta hai is film mein kuch Nazis honge kyunki aapne German intelligence ke baare mein bolte hai. Ya aur famous actors hai is one mein?
haan, yah naaji ke saath involve karta hai naaji ke saath. dusre actors jo tum jante ho kya Keira Knightley ne Joan clarke, Matthew Goode ne Hugh Alexander ka role play kiya aur Tom Goodman-Hill ne Sgt ka role. Staehl
mujhe voh actors aur actresses ka naam pasand hai. ache cast lagta hai. kya yeh ek violent film hai? ya ek bacho ke saath dekh sakate hain?
No, certainly nahi violent. Ye ek war film hai, in a sense par minimal violence hai jaise ki ye turing ka portrayal se relate karta hai jisne cryptanalyst ki kaam kiya tha.
Okay. mujhe film dekhne me lambe accha lage.kya usme funny part hai?
nahin, frankly ye bahut sad hai at points par kyunki ye Turing ke romantic interest ke baare mein involve hai.
oh. wah toh tragic laga.kya tum ko film me Turing ko hero keh sakte ho?
Han, kafi so. Turing German encrypted messages ko decode karne me successfully determine kar paya ki Germans ka galat samay pehle kahi plan kar rahe the.
Interesting. Kya tumhe lagta hai ki film real duniya ka representative hai? kya yah really hua?
Well, mostly hai, but critic Andrew Grant ne Science News ki "... like so many other Hollywood biopics, iski usme major artistic license hai aur Turing ka actual story itni compelling hai"
Alright. film me villain hai? villain kaun hai?
Ye koi direct villain hai, just Germans.
Haha. Kya koee paatr hai color?
Nahi jo mujhe janta hai, nahin.
kya is film mein kuch government conspiracies ka mention kiya?
There are conspiracies, haan. in fact, Turing ko yek point se laga ki ek cryptography team ka member ek Soviet spy hai. Ab Britain me, Soviets British me side the, but Turing was alarmed to find this information out. You could call that a conspiracy in itself.
Wow, bohat captivating. Mujhe is scene ko jaisa describe karte ho. "The Imitation Game" se konsa particular scene khada hota hai?
mera favorite scene hona chahiye hai jisme Turing is able to finally crack the Enigma codes Germans were using with his cryptographic machines. Very thrilling!
Haan, kaafi accha lagta hai. Kya philm ko major themes mein social equality touch hai?
not quite, par Turing ki homosexuality ko address karta jo ek current social topic hai discussion mein.

AAP SE BAAT KARANA BHI ACHHA LAGA

Achcha.
Hi, movie ka naam kya hai?
HI. Is movie Iron Man hai. Tumhe kya lagta hai?
Hmmmm sounds interesting.
ye kis baare mein hai?
ye ek aadmi ke baare mein hai jo rich hai aur khud ko super suit banata hai taaki wo world ko save karta hai. Isme Robert Downey Jr. aur Gwyneth Paltrow hai.
Cool! super suit kya karata hai?
ye usey fly kar deta hai, shoot out lasers aur kafi kuch banata hai. Ye usey pretty strong banata hai. Ye kaafi cool hai.
Wait back up. Usme kya shoot kar raha hai?
voh thoda lasers aur stuff shoot kar raha tha. Robert Downey tho Iron man ka role play kar raha tha aur voh ache lagta. uska character toh tony stark ka character hein jo genius inventor tha aur voh stanek industries ka CEO tha
kya ye business kafi successful hai?
Ya. Woh bohat rich hai aur bohat successful hai aur wo apni assistant ke saath pyar kar raha hai jo Gwyneth Paltrow ne play kiya hai. Ye funny movie bhi hai. Isme accha CG ke saath bahut impressive set hoti hai.
kya uska assistant uske adventure ke liye help karega?
aapko.. she helps him a little.. she is smart as well.. yeh movie 2008 me aaya hai aur Jon Favreau ne direct kiya hai. iska mein jeff bridges aur terrence howard bhi hai
aisa lagta hai ki isme kafi cast hai. vah suit kitna lagata hai?
wo bhi uska suit banata hai jab wo war-torn Afghanistan mein ek uska weapon dene ke liye jata hai aur jab uske convoy par terrorist group attack karte hain tab wo seriously hurt ho jata hai. Ek doctor bhi uske saath capture ho jata hai aur usne uske chest mein ek device bharapoor banata hai jo usey dying karne ke liye jata hai aur wo uske device ki tarah suit banata hai.
Ye kaafi impressive hai. Kya is movie me koi bade naam hai?
acha.. shawn toub ne doctor ke role play kiya jo us device ko Iron man chest me daal diya aur unko suit banaya
To Iron man ke chest me kuchh hai?

"Despicable Me is a 3D cartoon comedy of whiplash-quick laughs, funny punch lines and wickedly gimmicky appreciation. "Kids will dig it, adults will amusement aur ab kuch aise different hoga jabki theater me walk rahe the. "Despicable Me likable nahi kar deta." Hi; maine suna hai ki tum ek movie ke bare mein pad rahe ho. Movie ka naam kyaa hai?
la la land. tum musicals mein bante ho?
Haan, main vaastav mein kaafi sabase sangeet pasand karta hoon. Kya la la la laind ek sangeet hai?
haan, yeh tho aise hi hein lekin yeh tho kaafi musicals ke opposite hein.. muje music ke liye tho pasand hein, lekin jab musical movie aaye tho mein ab bhi pehle hi fence kar raha hein.. lekin yeh alag hi iski characters se thoda different hein
To mere liye most musicals have a plot of some sort tha, kya aap yah kehte hain ki iski usual plot nahi hai? Mujhe musicals pasand hai kyonki usually wo lighthearted aur characters mazedaar hai. La La land me characters kaise different hote hai norm se?
Movie mein main characters Ryan Gosling hai aur Emma stone bhi hai. Mere liye ye zyada drama actors hain par ye musical ka sound bahut achi lagti hai. Maine Gosling ko musical me nahi dekha lekin ye movie is worth watching kyunki mein piano ek jazz genre se coupled hoti hai.
Oh awesome, mujhe ye style bahut pasand hai! Mujhe koi idea nahi tha ki dono Ryan Gosling aur Emma stone sing kar sakti hai. Ye whole film ek jazz genre me acchi thi?
The jazz genre is movie ka theme hai but ye film is the never ending quest to make it big in Los Angeles. Do lead characters of course end up working karte hain, fall in love or movie isme unka life and personal life shows karte hain. Mujhe lagta hai ye movie thoda unrealistic hai but is musical aspect ko enjoy karte hain.
Tumhe unrealistic iske baare me kya lagta hai? Usme kis type ki ups aur downs hai? The theme interesting hai; ye typical ke show business mein koi koi bhi nahi dekhne ka, aur of course songs ke liye aur jyada fuel deta hai.
Unrealism movie se jo past ki dance halls se aathi hai, wo ab except movie me exist nahi nahi hoti. It is entertaining though movie ke musical aspect se. Humu sirf imagine kar sakta hai ki movie ke beech mein jo actors ke saath struggle ho jaate hain. Is movie ke sahi me actors ko ache moments ko enjoy karni paaye. Is movie me may give rise to the resurgence of musicals back into the movie mainstream. Kya tumhe lagta hai ye kaise hogi?
To kya movie mein dance halls treat kiya jaise hain ki wo vaastav mein exist hai, ya ve set me se parts hai jo ki characters are working on while trying to make it big in LA? Music ache mein sabse sab band karta hai, yah bahut sahi hai. Us scenes ka struggles kya hai? Mujhe lagta hai ki musicals depending on scenes, aur type of music plot.
voh dance halls tho movie effects ke liye create kiya aur voh main characters ka stardom break into stardom hein.. struggles tho music ke type ka music jo voh like karte hein lekin directions attention ko dene ke liye tho dusra story hein.. tumhe musicals bhi pasand hein kya?
oh, to wo dancing ke dancing ke sath struggles ke liye kuch window type ka hai, sangeet aur private life ke sath, aisa lagta hai. Mujhe dancing se musical pasand hai, mujhe lagta hai ki ye dancing se interest aur liveliness add krta hai. kya is film mein kafi dancing hote hai? aur kis type ki dancing bhi hai?
ye film me dancing ke liye itna jyada nahi hai.isa lagta hai main characer is trying to save the genre of music jise wo use popularity se hone k liye pad raha hai. Yeh music is themed to the black musical genre jo Southern States me itni pedominant hai. Kya tum kho treasure movies dekhne me jyada emphasis karte ho?
kya film ne use reason diye ki wo kis genre ko pasand karata hai kyon voh jyada popular ho gaya? kyon ki voh primaryly us location mein popular hai? muje movies ke saath singing ya dancing ko pasand hein, ya kuch combination bhi. la la la la laind kya kiya
haan, is movie mein kis type ka dancing ko kiya thoda fantasy hein.. real life mein, probably ache nahi kiya lekin dekhna pasand aaya.. is movie mein kuch moments bhi hein jahaan main character us music ka dying art ke baare mein baat kar raha tha, lekin voh us music ko support kar raha tha. kya aapako lagata hai ki movies aur real life musicals abhi bhi fantasy hein?
philm mein kis tarah ka dancing ke baare mein kaafi genres hein. real life mein bhi kafi genres hein, tho muje dancing ka style bhi pasand hein, kya art tho dying hein?
Since main bilkul nahin dance krta to mujhe movie main kis type ka dance depict karna kafi mushkil hai. Yadi ye movie mein hai ya nahi , dancing bilkul foreign skill hai. Mujhe pata hai ki sabhi dance style ke saath hai but ye mujhe nahi pata. Kya tum different dance style ke saath dancing karte ho?
mujhe alag tarah kee dance acha lagta hai, haan. mujhe lagta hai iss movie mein jazz dancing ho sakta hai. kya yah kuchh se jitanee mein sundar rakhata hai? ya fir dancing ya slow dancing?
mein tho Hollywood dancing ka hein.. lekin yeh tho uska main theme tho hollywood ka hein.. yeh tho uska romance aur romancing toh hein.. yeh musical romance movie tho masses ke liye banaya hein.. aap is movie ke liye piqued hein? kya?
Hollywood dancing is probably a combination of a bunch of styles. Mujhe lagta hai mere interest piqued hai, ha, par mujhe curious hai ki unhone show business mein ye kaise make kar raha hai.
muje lagtha hein ki yeh ek movie hein jo koi expectations nahi karenge.. aaj news mein tho kahi drama hein jo muje reality se break nahi hota.. humko light hearted movie dekhna chahiye jo sab relax aur fantasize karte.. kya aap agree nahi karenge?
me sehmat hu, ki agar yah ek movie hai jiska accha music aur dancing hai to yah mujhe achi tarah sound kartha, for sure.Movie kis time period me lee gayi hai?
movie tho aajkal ka sabse recent time period depict kiya hein.. tho yeh thoda fantasy hein.. lekin muje lagtha hein ki, voh lead actors Ryan Gosling aur Emma stone tho is movie mein ab kaam kar sakthe hein aur iss tarah kee philm mein ab kaam karthe ho sakthe
Ah,tumhe lagta hai ki dance halls ko fit nahi kyunki wo history me older hai. I agree ki wo dono good actors hain aur musical me dekhne me surprised hu. Kya movie happily end hoti hai?
movie ke ant tho aise socha hein ki ache chemistry aur logon ke beech mein ache cheeta huva.. mujhe lagta hai ki ache dream ke saath jiske liye hope aur inspiration purana chahiye. ye ek movie he jo log music aur plot se sirf bhul dethe.. kya aap actors ko dekhana chahte ho? mujhe lagata hai ki is type ka movie jisse musical aspects se repeating karna chahiye.
main movies ek-doo baar dekhta kyon ki main enjoyment ya study ke liye particular scene dekhta kyon. To aap kah rahe hai ki movie music ke saath dekhana chahata hai ya plot ke kaaran, ya dono?
movie is music ke liye tho worth waching karte. jo ki maintaiining ka music jo lead actor wants to keep alive is the main theme here. voh adamant hein aur us music ke passion ko show karte aur ussi lead character ke liye thoda romancing hoga.

storyline kaise hai
Main cast hired hai ya jyada recruited hai corporate espionage karne ke liye dreams enter karne ke liye. Lekin movie ka focal point hai jahan rathar ne kisi ke paas idea lene ke liye ki voh us person ke dreams mein aajata hai.
To wo basically making or participating lucid dreams hain?
sabhi ke liye espionage karne ke liye likha hai kisi ke liye woh ek aur dream me infiltrate kar rahe hai, so while ve, team is dealing with all the persons ke subconsciousness ke liye jab kisi ke needs ko bend karne ki try kar rahe hai

Is movie Dunkirk kafi acchi lagti hai. Isme bahut ache reviews mile hai aur bahut interesting plot hai.
is movie ka title familiar hein, konsa actors hain?
Fionn Whitehead, Tom Glynn, Jack Lowden, Harry Styles, aur Aneurin Barnard main cast hain. Wo zyada popular actors nahi hain, but critics kehte hain ki unki performance spectacular tha aur directing phenomenal tha.
Okay, thanks. Movie kis baare mein hai.
ye allied forces ke evacuation ke baare mein hai, mostly british, Dunkirk, France mai major battle tha World War II ke dauraan. Isme kafi dialogue nahi hai, but bahut dramatic moments aur suspense hai cinematography aur music se.
ye zyadatar movies ke comparison mein different lagta hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki acting bahut accha hoga agar zyada dialogue nahi hote honge!
haan, kaafi accha lagta hai. Rotten Tomatoes par ise 92% rating hai, Metacritic par 94/100 aur CinemaScore par A- hai. Ye kaafi bolati hai agar ise acchi ratings deti hai to
Whoa, yah kuch high rating hai jisse Rotten Tomatoes se bhi hone chahiye. Main intrigued hu and am interested in learning more is movie ke bare me, especially itne itna highly rated hai.
Kya tum typically war movies enjoy karte ho?
agar voh tho overly gorey nahi aise bhi hein. agar story line tho ache hein aur historically accurate hein, tho mein jarur interested hoon. mein thoda curious hoon.
Critical responses mein koi historical accuracy nahi mention kiya lekin mujhe lagta hai ki yeh hai. Characters fictional ho sakta hai lekin mujhe lagta hai ki evacuation ka overall sequence historically accurate hai.
yah lagta hai kuchh main shayad dekhunga. kya british pop group ke saath Harry styles nahi hai? ya, mujhe mistaken ho skta. main actors ka faces main dusri movies ke saath place karne ki koshish kar raha hoon. kya music score kuch jo well-known hai ya relatively unknown hai?
Haan, Harry Styles One Direction ka part tha but mujhe lagta hai woh group chori aur solo gaya. Unfortunately music score ke baare mein kuch mention nahin hai ya kisne banaya. However, yah mention karta hai ki cinematographer was Hoyte van Hoytema.
Okay, haan, is Harry ke baare mein maine suna hai. Mujhe nahi pata tha ki woh acting mein gayi hai, lekin aisa lagta hai ki woh ek accha choice banayi critics ne is movie ke liye respond ki. Main ye movie ko dekhne me bohat interested hun.
us first scene mein already kafi action chal raha hai. beach par kafi German dive-bomber attack hai jahan Allied soldiers evacuation ke liye wait kar rahe hain. next main, us hospital ship sunk ho jata hai aur then ek German u-Boat se blow hota hai. is movie mein kafi dramatic moments ho jata hai
Oh, mujhe wo movie pasand hai jo right away chalu jata hai. Aisa lagta hai Dunkirk aisa most definitely karti hai. Main apanee mind mein isko picture kar sakta hu. Ek hospital ship ho ja raha hai, yah vaastav mein mera emotions pe right off the bat se tug kar sakti hai. Ye bohot dramatic lagata hai jaise ye start karta hai.
us action next scene me hone laga. british navy tho civilian boats ko rescue people karne ke liye resort karna tha, aur mukhy characters, Alex aur Tommy ko small boat me hideout karna tha jo Germans ne shoot kiya aur boat tho bullet holes se vapas gaya. germans tho kaafi attacks kar rahe the first couple scenes mein.
muje laga bahut action aur drama combined laga.. muje lagtha hein ki mein us se edge mein ho jarur.. kaafi emotions ka scenes jo kuchh chura gaya hein, especially us Germans ne boat mein target practice karte.
haan, yah really shows karta hai ki kaise allied forces kafi outnumbered hai agar jaaji ne random boats par target practice karte hai. Clearly unke paas plenty of ammunition aur strong presence hai beach ke peeche. Yahan boat sink ho gaya, Alex aur Tommy apne paas bomber ke peechhe padh jaate hai but usse baahar jaate hain. Eventually wo rescue ho jaate hain, but lagtha hai ki unko Germans ke paas jaata hai.
yeh Alex aur Tommy ke liye jaise chal raha hein, ant thoda unpredictable lagta, especially is movie ke war ke baare mein.
mein maantha hoon.. muje thoda is tarah ka ambiyon ko nahi patha, lekin tom ke ek survivor ke jeevan se kaha jata hai jo beach mein retreat kiya gaya.. sabhi allied forces evacuation ke liye wait kar rahe the, tho clearly sab kuch choice nahi tha evacuate kare..
muje tho shocked huva ki muje isko kabhi pata nahi tha, lekin bahut glad huva ki is movie ko pasand kiya.. lekin jab survivor ke tarah battle of dunkirk ke liye, it's really hard to imagine un saare mixed emotions jo real Tommy ko aisa feel kiya tha.. yeh movie tho ache worth watching hein
Oh no, wo puri survivor nahi tha poore entire battle ka. Uska squad thoda ambushed tha aur wo puri survivor tha jiska survived aur escaped kiya tha. Next scene me, Commander Bolton ne confirm kiya ki 300,000 saare soldiers evacuate kar liya jo expected tha. Apparently they intended to create a stronghold in Dunkirk, but were outnumbered and had no choice but the evacuate or lose even more soldiers.
Oh! Okay, I understand. Still, apni squad ko marne wala, kaafi awful hein. I imagine uske survivor ke guilt se suffer kar sake, kaafi survivor ke liye itni tragic tha. War tragic tha, but aaj aisi log peace ko appreciate karte jaathe. 10 Commander Bolton ko evacuate karne ke liye itna incredible tha. Mujhe lagta hai ki is movie mein bahut saare dramatic action scenes dikhane hoga.
Definitely. Fortunately Alex aur Tommy evacuate ho gaye aur Britain safely return karne jaate hain jahan woh citizens dvaara Woking mein welcomed ho gaye.
I would love to see that scene for sure, I'd need something happy after all of the traumatic events in the war scenes. Kya tumhe pta hai Alex aur Tommy actors kaun play krte hain?
Flon Whitehead plays Tommy aur Harry Styles plays Alex

haan, is what they do, animals act like us. sometimes really weird watching the behaviours that do be portray ed that way. Really eye-opening. Aapko ye realize hota he ki sometimes we stereotype people without even trying.
haan, police cheif toh african buffalo hein, yaani starkly strongly willed yabull headed hoga.. ham definitely police cheifs ko aise hi consider karunga
Jabbari Bunnies "innocent naive women" hai. Unhone apne aap ko equal shot milne ki try kar rahe hain.
Exactly. Judy hopps ne bunny ko portray kiya gaya jo ek amazing choice tha. Yeh really highlight karta hai ki society ka view kaise kiya people. Wo even hardships ko manage kar sakti hai par wo valedictorian tha but ye who ya bhi wo tha, unhe abhi bhi parking duty le liya.
Mujhe really acha laga jab judy nehe pata tha ki Nick was bullied as a child. She realizes ki all types of people have been through hardships.

ok. ye ek homeless black teen ke bare mein hai, has drifted in and out of the school system for years. Then Leigh Anne Tuohy (Sandra Bullock) aur uska husband, Sean (Timmigh) take him in. Tuohys eventually Michael ki legal guardians ban jaati hai, dono dono uske life or theirs se dono dono grow hote hai. Michael ka tremendous size aur protective instincts make him a formidable force on the gridiron, aur uske new family aur sabse devoted tutor se help karne ke liye realize hote hai.

muje jesse eisenberg bahut pasand hein, is role mein tho bahut badiya hein.. muje zuckerberg ka starr karne mein kuch soch raha tha.. muje zuckerberg ke baare mein kuch nahi soch raha tha, lekin kuch cold ke unke life mein, aur kuch uske success ke baare mein soch raha tha.
us ke baare me mainne socha tha, smart aur arrogant lekin reclusive ki tarah. Mujhe Facesmash ke website ke baare me bhi unaware aur surprise laga,jo Facebook ke idea hone se pehle Facebook ka idea aaya.Facebook me Facesmash ke saath dekhne me interesting laga
Haan, mujhe laga ki dekhna kaafi cool tha ki kaise Facebook original idea se Facesmash se evolve hua. Kuch aise lagta hai - Facebook ka whole idea bahar aayi thi kyunki Zuckerberg had made a site to let students female classmates ke attractiveness ko rate karte.
ye amazing tha ki kaise Harvard ki network ka parts crash ho gaya aur phir uski liye academic probation mila. Aur kaise ye all helped lead to Zuckerberg actually Winklevoss twins ko meeting. ye interesting hai ki kaise wo log Facebook banayenge.
mein maantha hoon, muje tho unka aise logon ko kuch inside look karna tho pasand hein, aur usse zuckerberg ne pehle winklevoss twins aur uska partner nikold kiya tho uska chance mila aur unka facemash tho unka attention le liya
Yea, ye definitely tumhe iske baare me socha deta he, I wonder agar MySpace abhi bhi bada hoga agar Facebook nahi invented ho gaya. Mujhe ye bhi nahi pata tha k itne sare log involved he,especially jab Zuckerberg was always the face of Facebook, mujhe ye lagta he ki ye sab uske bare me hai.
Oh definitely, mujhe lagta hai ki Facebook ka aant Myspace ke liye pretty much spell karta hai. Agar Facebook aa rahe thi tab tak Myspace bahut jyada popular hoga. Aur main sahamat hoon, mujhe laga hai ki zuckerberg ne sab par Facebook ka idea aayenge aur uske sab ko start kiya, to ye kaafi saare logo involved tha uske conception mein.
mein tho surprised huva ki Napster ka founder bhi involved tha
Bilkul, mujhe koi idea nahi tha k dono ek founder tha. Mujhe ye dekhne me accha laga ki kaise Facebook Harvard students ke liye originally intended tha, jab ye expand ho raha tha dusre schools ko include kare. Mujhe yaad hai jab ye college students ke liye only available tha.
muje yaad hein yar, muje uska facebook signup karne ka email yaad nahi hein, ab sabhi ko hein. muje yaad hein ki voh tho TheFacebook ka naam yaad kartha. muje lagtha hein ki voh the"the" was a good idea from Sean parker
Oh haan, ye start allowing kar raha tha mere junior year ka high school me join karne k liye, and saare me so excited they ki ye chance sign up karne k liye! me agree karta hu ki Thefacebook ko Parker ke suggestion se drop karne k sirph ache idea tha, iska naam thoda snappier aur jyada memorable hoga.
Oh tum mere liye thoda young ho, mujhe ye sign up karne ke liye old bhi thi jab ye college students ke liye exclusive thi. But ye tab ke baad ke liye everyone ke liye open thi. Mujhe ye kehna acha laga ki jab company Palo Alto mein aa gye, unhone saare big technology company ko join kia.
haan, muje lagtha hein ki, voh cool hein yar, kyon ki voh Facebook ka signup mein university emails ka - bet yeh pretty cool aur exclusive tha (wo aisa lagtha hein, us time mein anyway!). mein tho surprised nahi huva pe Palo alto se kyon jyada popular ho gaya. yah bahut sahi hai, usne sach me apne dost ko chhod diya hai ek thoda saal ke liye. mujhe thoda funny laga ki kaise usne page ko refresh kar diya jab unka friend ex girlfriend ko request kar diya.

Hello! kya tumne paragraph mila?
Ye movie hai The Great Gatsby (2013) jisko Baz Luhrmann ne direct kiya hai aur Rotten Tomatoes ka score 48% diya hai. Ye Metacritic score 55/100 tha aur CinemaScore B thi. Ye movie about Jay Gatsby ka play Leonardo Di'Caprio ne play kiya hai jo ek famous billionaire hai aur uske mansion mein parties host krte hai.
isme The Great Gatsby kaha jata hai ?
jay gatsby ke baad, voh tho jayega best parties ko host kartha, aur daisy ka thora motive tho daisy ka saamana hein. voh uska former lover hein
ok. Leo choose karte hai diverse characters
Movie ko bhi acche critics se nikla, jaisa ki kuch claimed: "intractably wrong with the film is that there's no reality to heighten; it's a spectacle in search of a soul".
Accha billionaire ka lavish parties awaiting his ex lover ka, old skool romantic lagta hai. soul search en route:)
haan, yeh definitely roaring twenties new york mein resonate karta hai, jaisa movie thi
New York me definitely kuch great theater aur music twenties me dekhi hai. Maine Luhrmann ka bahut zyada work nhi dekhi hai
Maine bhi nahi but maine The Great Gatsby ko enjoy kiya kyunki mujhe romantic dramas pasand hai. Tumhara favorite genre kya hai?
Mujhe Comedy pasand hai, Mysteries, Thrillers, Nature/Animal documentaries. But ek well made Period drama refreshing hai
Haan, to Great Gatsby mein, story Nick Carraway dwara bola he jo ek WW1 veteran he jo becomes an alcoholic.Uski doctor ki recommendation se hi, wo apni thoughts churate hai lekin shuruaat mein us small house ko abandon kar jata hai jo waise Jay Gatsby ki mansion se right next tha
Mujhe bahut interesting lag raha hai, New York me Gatsby mansion ko aata aur next hona therapeutic lagta hai ..
To kya Gatsby befriend Carraway hai aur friendship begins ?
or Carraway ne just uske little house se samjhta hai ?
kya Carraway actually Daisy ka cousin (Gatsby ki former lover) hai jo ab Tom Buchanan se married hai. Tom Gatsby ko pasand nahi karta kyonki uska new money status aur daisy ki previous relationship to Carraway hai. Carraway uski ghar se observe nahi karta.
Wo ise aur zyada interesting bana deta hai. Carraway ko apni cousin ke baare me curious hona chahiye aur Daisy ko Gatsby se marriage ka choice kya tha?
Also Gatsby being wishful for his former lover to show up at one of his parties.
haan, yeh tho curious hein, kyon ki kyon ki daisy tom ke saath kyon ki koisy daisy hein

mujhe lagta hai ye is whole soul searching part mujhe aati hai

Also ye bata sakta hai Daisy ka perspective love ke liye bhi.
Han, it's quite confusing as to why she didn't wait for Gatsby agar she still loves him.
twenties mein, women ko young aur wealthy prospects se marriage ka expect kar rahe the

film ka antagonist kaun hai?
Anna ko dashing Prince Hans milti hai. Anna ko propose karta hai !!
Film mein koi villain nahi hai.
The Duke Queen Elsa ko ek monster bolti hai jab wo accidentally apni powers coronation ke dauran accidentally release karta hai.
Lekin Queen Elsa ne apni crown ko disband kiya aur ek palace of ice ko build kiya jaise alone rahne ke liye.
kya tumhe film pasand hai?
haan! iska koi unexpected plot turn hoga. Hans actually ek villian he.
kya ye spoiler dewar hai?
Anna Elsa ko chase karta hai. Elsa accidentally Anna ke heart ko freeze karta hai. Trolls Anna ko batate hain ki usko true love karne ka act chahiye. So use Hans ko dhoondhana hai usey True love kiss karne k liye. Wo use ek room mein lock karta hai aur frozen heart ke marne ke liye.

kya tumne use dekha hai?
nahi maine nahi dekhi
kya ye orginal hai ya kuch book se adapted hai?
ye as far as i can tell original hai. Lagta hai ki main characters sab tarah se spots mein evacuate karne ki try kar rahe hain.
Plot aur type ko read karne ki try kar rahe hain
Plot ke bare me aur batao.
main characters Tommy Alex aur Gibson kuch Scottish troops se join karte hai jab Dunkirk mein aamtaur par or naav mein hide karte hai, Germans naav mein holes shoot karte hain aur jab tide rile ho jata hai, wo sab boat abandon karte hain jab wo sink ho jata hai.
kya isme happy ending hai?
Wo barely escape kar paate hain aur wo pata chalte hain ki 300k troops evacuate ho gaye hain aur wo use back home chala jaate hain. Wo local heroes ke roop mein dikhate hain
kya wo sab British hai ya koi nationality involved hai?
Mujhe lagta hai ki ek subplot hai jahan father aur son main characters ko rescue karte hain. Wo British, Scottish aur French hai.
ye movie ka long synopsis hai
koi kuch else?
koi interesting tidbits?
I guess ye sahi hai - ek war movie hai jisme main characters ko sea mein blow hone ke baad apne father aur son ko aur kuch aur men ko saving ki aur unhe back home karne ke liye kam kar rahe hain.

ye bohat backstory hai: in October 2003 mein, 19-year-old Harvard University student Mark Zuckerberg ko uski girlfriend Erica Albright se insulting entry likha hai Albright ke baare mein aur uski dorm mein rehne k liye. dorm mein rehne k liye, zuckerberg ne apni business partner Divya Narendra ko Harvard Connection ka business me liya aur wo exclusive nature of Harvard students ka photos ko steal kiya tha, phir site visitors ko attractiveness rate kar dete hain. jab site pe crash ho jata hai, zuckerberg ko six months ka academic probation mil jata hai. lekin, Facemash ka popularity Harvard upperclassmen aur twins Cameron aur Tyler Winklevoss aur uske business partner ko attention leta hai.

ahah well facebook use karte ho?
In October 2003 mein, 19-year-old Harvard University student Mark Zuckerberg ne uski girlfriend Erica Albright se dumped kiya. Uski dorm mein rehne k liye, zuckerberg ne Albright ke baare mein ek insulting entry likha hai. Ye campus website ka naam Facemash hai, jo college database mein female students ko steal karne ke liye hacking hai, phir site visitors ko attractiveness rate kar dete hai. Jab traffic to the site crash ho jata hai, zuckerberg ko six months ka academic probation mil jata hai. However, Facemash ka popularity Harvard upperclassmen aur twins Cameron aur Tyler Winklevoss aur uska business partner Divya Narendra ko attention leta hai.
haa agar mein use kartha hoon
well, facebook bilkul stolen idea tha, jise mark ko millions dollars settlements me pay karni padegi
yeh bahut interesting hai
mujhe nahi pata tha k creators Harvard main دراسة the
haan mark de tho actually mein aa gya
then stealing accha hai ??? jejejej ye moral nahi hai
haha sahee
sabian aur zuckerberg ne fellow student Christy lee ke saath facebook me "Facebook me" diya, jo dono ko impress karta hai. jab facebook popularity ho rahi thi tab zuckerberg ne yale university, columbia university aur stanford university me network ko extend kiya. lee ne saverin aur zuckerberg ko napster ke cofounder sean parker se milkar "billion dollar" vision diya jo impresses zuckerberg. unhone Thefacebook ka "The" dalna suggest kiya. jab parker ne palo alto mein business development karne ke liye move kiya tha. jab jagakar usne facebook ko do continents mein expand karna promise kiya tha, zuckerberg ne use ghar me rehne ka upayog kiya.
Movie ke doran, narrative is intercut kiya gaya hein usme Winklevoss twins' aur Saverin ki respective lawsuits ke liye. Winklevoss twins claim karte hain ki Zuckerberg ne unka idea le liya aur Saverin ne Facebook ka shares unfairly dilute kiya jab company incorporate hua. End mein, Marylin Delpy, a junior lawyer for the defense, informs Zuckerberg ki unhone Saverin k sath settle kiya, kyunki Facebook ka startup ka sordid details aur Zuckerberg ka apni callous ka attitude jury ke liye highly unsympathetic hoga. Jab sab logo chod diya, Zuckerberg ne Facebook ka friend request ko request kiya aur phir webpage ko refresh kiya. Superman ka absence. phir chod rahe the.

Mujhe laga ye key scene hai, ye reality me grounding hai aur unke mission k liye shuru hoti hai. Tumhe kya lagta hai ki apne armed projections apne dreams ko possible intruders se protect karne ke liye?
Accha aur bahut creative. Isse lagta hai ki tumhara dreams ko constant alert karne ke liye kafi interesting hai.
Kya aap ko interesting lagta hai ki characters injure hue the in these attacks?
mein bhi, muje bhi voh tho itna frightening laga ki voh dream mein dying hein, jo kuch nature ka hein jahan heavy sedatives involved hein, voh dying person ke liye limbo mein rehne chahiye. tho aap ko kya laga ki voh world mein almost impossible laga unconscious se escape karne ke liye. agar nahi
main bahut scared ho sakata hun! main imagine itna "mission" nahi kar sakti. Kya tumhe us time element ka subposition acha laga jahan har level mein time prast hota hai?
I do, yahan whole operation ke liye tenseness ka sense add karta hai, jahan initial layer mein tho kuch seconds padono, upper level mein tho hours, ya even days. Mujhe scary nahi lagta ki Mal believed ki wo limbo mein wake up ho gaya, resulting in uska mind wake up ho gaya.
haan! bahut scary! muje yakin hi nahi hota ki mal reality ki taraf se nahi rehne ki

muje lagtha hein ki, is world ko apni use karne ke baad, muje transition karna mushkil hein.. pura life ka koi dunga kar, ya wake up karna, realize karna kaafi interesting experience hoga.. tragic hein usme

Hello, to movie ka naam kya hai?
Movie Dunkirk he jo pichhale saal aaee aur Christopher Nolan ne direct ki
Dunkirk mein kaunse actors hain?
kuch leading cast Fionn Whitehead, Jack Lowden aur Harry Styles hain
kya yah kahata hai ki philm ke lie kya ratings the?
Movie ko generally excellent rating mili hai. Rotten Tomatoes pe 92% fresh rating hai, MetaCritic ne 94/100 score diya aur CinemaScore pe A- score diya.
Nice, nice. Kya tumhe pata hai movie ka time period kaisi thi?
Movie Dunkirk k evacuation ke baad World War II thi
philm mein konsa armies involved hai? jaise konsa taray hai
Most of cast me British army aur members of the Royal Air Force he.movie land sea aur air se evacuation ka perspective show karti he jo ki really interesting he.
Ah I see! Kya tumhe movie ki rating pata hai? Like agar PG rated hai ya R rated hai.
muje us movie ka rating nahi patha, lekin yeh depicts thousands of soldiers ko beach par jaane ke liye band kar rahe the, kyon ki germans are closing in. kuch scenes mein shell shocked soldiers ka depictions hein aur German attacks on the stranded soldiers
kya movie mein koi interesting events hogi?
main characters tho us ship ko board karne ke liye try kar rahe the aur beach par passage denied kiya.. thoda german dive bombers ne laga
Ye to unfortunate hai! Kya ye true hai ki kaafi navy navy naves use ki gayi fisherman naves.
haan, british navy ne bahut saare civilian vessels ko employed kiya hein, is tarah ke liye thoda closer ho jaatha beach mein
kya characters eventually naav par pahunch jaate hain?
kuch characters hide karte hain ek trawler ke paas beach par jo abandoned tha aur tide rise hone se wait karte hain taki ve sea me le jaate hain. haalaanki german troops naav par target practice karte hain, boat ko bahut holes dalte aur sink leta hai
kya wo marte hai ya uske baad kya wo survive kar sakti hai?
wahi boat sink ke baad voh civilian vessel se pickup kiya gaya, the Moonstone, jo movie ka part mein hein, jo rescue karne ke liye naval vessels ka role depict kiya hein
kya hoga iske baad?
Wo soldiers rescue ho gaye hai. Meanwhile British destroyer ne kisi soldiers ko pick up kiya lekin bomber ne sunk kiya. bomber shot down ho jata hai aur oil destroyer se escape ho jata hai
kya iske ship pe bhi fire ho jaate hain? ya voh avoid kar sakthe they
Wo british channel cross karne ke liye safely jate hain aur british kamare return karne ke liye
kya is film ko koi awards jeete?
Mujhe yakeen nahin hai ki agar film ne koi award jeete hai, lekin events ka depiction bahut badiya hai. Film ke end mein ek scene hai jahan Naval Commander ne confirm karta hai ki over 300,000 British troops evacuate ho chuke hai, originally kahi amount mein saved ho sakata tha.
To operation successful tha. Kya movie ke dauran Churchill ne appearance kiya?
Mujhe nahi lagta wo film ke dauran dekha hai, lekin uska newspaper me apna address unme se likha hai, jab tak wo train me wapas chala jate hai Britain me
I see! mujhe is film ke bare me batane ke liye thanks. yah helpful tha

Tumhe 2008 ki movie Iron Man 2008 me kya lagta hai?

Tumhe Tony Stark ka love interest, Pepper potts ka kya lagta hai?
Mujhe lagta hai Gwyneth Paltrow usse play karne k liye accha choice tha. Use bahut sa versatility hai role me kyonki woh professional assistant ke beech mein shift kar rahi hai to beez pasand interest ke liye.
Tumhe Yinsen character k baare me kya thoughts hai?
I agree. Yin Sen ek really interesting character tha jisne humanity ko Stark super genius se next dala. Mujhe Jeff Bridges ka villain bhi accha laga. Main use barely recognized kiya.
Mujhe lagta hai ki wo Tony Starke ke against ek means me serve karta hai. Jitna idealistic rich billionaire jo weapons sell karta hai aur conniving greedy villain jo dono sides me weapons sell karta hai
Kya tumhe lagta hai Terrence Howard acchi James Rhodes me serve ki hai?
mujhe aisa lagta hai. Yin Sen bahut Tony Stark ko compare karta hai, to nei James Rhodes hai, lekin ye time is terms of level-headness aur reason se.
Kya tumhe lagta hai ki Stark ko responsible feel kar sakta hai jisse wo weapons sell karta hai? Kya wo film ke beginning mein bad person hai?
Mujhe lagta hai wo awareness nahi hai, preferring to be more of a playboy billionaire. Agar wo bad hai to wo sirf Obadiah ki kya kar raha hai

Hello, kya tumne The Social Network movie dekhi hai?
maine dekha hai. Apko 2010 ki biographical drama direct ki hai David Fincher ne, Facebook ke founding ke baare me?
Haan, woh David Fincher ne direct kiya tha. Yeh ek pretty good movie tha, iska CinemaScort rating B+ hai.
Yea, main sure nahi tha ki yah kaise turn out hoga, but Jesse Eisenberg (jisko Mark Zuckerberg ka role play kiya) ne bahut accha kaam kiya. Although mujhe yah ajeeb lagata hai ki Zuckerburg ne Facebook ke staff ka involvement kiya tha us project mein.
I did too. But isme kahi celebrities thi. Justin Timberlake ki tarah, usne movie me Sean Parker play kiya. Columbia Pictures ka release us movie me hai. Amie Hammer ne is movie me two characters ko play kiya, Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss. Mujhe lagta hai ye challenge tha.
I am sure it did. Aur mujhe lagta hai Timberlake uski role me bhi mahan the. Film ne subject matter ke liye liberties leni hai aur Aaron Sorkin ne book "The Accidental Billionaires" par based his screenplay. I am sure ye actually sach hai, but ye certainly enjoyable hai.
isme kuch critical responses hain lekin is what said ki ye movie of the year hai. ve kahte hain ki fincher aur sorkin ne isse bhee further le diya
Yea critical response so far bahut positive hai. Rotten Tomatoes pe 96% aur Metacritic pe 95/100. Aur mujhe lagta hai ye definitely deserve karta hai.

A range between 72 to 81. Film captures kar deta hai ki kaun Maleficent tha but uska personality bhi nahi.

aapko konsi movie hein?
Iron man great movie hai. Robert Downey Jr. isme legendary performance bana deta hai.
Wo ek industrialist, genius inventor play karta hai jo ek billionaire CEO hai Stark Industries ka. As such, wo U.S. military ke liye chief weapons manufacturer hai.
Uski best friend James "Rhodey" Rhodes hai jise Terrence Howard ne play kiya hai. Use Stark Industries aur United States Air Force ke liasion mein ek important role play karta hai.
Oh agreed. Wo kuch samay ho gaya hai, but ye ek unique super hero movie hai jisme ek very intelligent business person hai jisne security ko privatize karne ki koshish ki hai
ek bada important character hai Pepper potts jo Gwyneth paltrow ne play kiya hai, wo Stark ka personal assistant hai aur budding love interest hai
haan, voh unique superhero hein
Movie ka tumhara favorite part kya hai?
Movie mein ek aur important person hai Obadiah Stane. Wo company ka second command hai Stark k liye. Wo mentor aur friend hai jo eventually Tony ko turn kar deta hai in an attempt to take over Stark Industries.
Movie ke end , wo apni own exosuit bana deta hai jis se wo stanek se fight kar sakta hai.
muje yaad nahi aatha ki voh apni par lene ki koshish kar raha tha
kyun?
To Tony Stark inherits the company from his father. Movie ke time, wo war-torn Afghanistan mein James Rhodes ke saath kaam kar leta hai uski new "Jericho" missile
demonstration ke baad uski convoy ambushed ho jata hai aur wo jana jata hai aur imprison kiya jata hai.
Wo Yinsen ke fellow prisoner sefriend karta hai. terrorist group Ten Rings, jisne use imprison kiya, wanted Stark and Yinsen to create a Jericho missile for them.
kya tumhe is movie ko jante ho?
First, Tony ko save karne ke liye Yinsen ek electromagnet in Stark's chest girta hai jisse shrapnel shards use uske heart aur marane se rok diya tha.
haan, badiya! mujhe ye movie pasand hai.
sweet
mujhe wo parts yaad hain lekin accha nahin hai
mein bilkul dubara dekhunga
Haan, to jab Stark escapes the prisoner group, wo charity event hold karta hai. Wo ko informed kiya jata hai ki his company ki weapons, Jericho, recently Ten Rings me deliver ki gayi hai.
Wo weapons Yinsen ke ghar village par attack karne wale the.
Stark bahut mad tha. Usne new armor, prototype Ironman suit, aur village me flin kiya. Afganistan me village ko save kar deta hai aur ghar me jaata hai.
Jab do F-22 Raptor fighter jets ne use dekha, uska identity Rhodes ne phone se reveal kiya jaise jets par attack karne ke attempt karne pe
The Ten Rings Stane k sath secretly meet karte hain aur vah group mar jata hai. Stane phir apne wreckage se naya suit manufacture kar leta hai. Fir, Pepper potts ne Stane ke bare me illegal shipment ke baare me pata chalta hai.
Tumhe kya lagta hai so far?

toy story ke baare me baat karte hai
1995 ka comedy, animation, adventure
John Lasseter ne isey direct kiya
interesting sound kar raha hai
Rotten Tomatoes: 100% aur average: 9/10 hai. Metacritic: 95/100 3. CinemaScore: A
Tom Hanks as Woody, ek pull-string cowboy doll.
Log isko really pasand karte hai
Tim Allen as Buzz Lightyear, ek space ranger action figure aur Woody ki rival, joki later use best friend ban jata hai
Movie kitni lambi hai?
1 gh 21 m
Are there songs in it?
Haan Randy Newman ki award winning songs
toy story tho 1995 ki American computer-animated buddy comedy adventure film hein, jo pixar animation ka studios ne likha hein aur voh us rivals se mil jaatha aur usko Andy ka affections aur uska family ko new home mein mil jaatha. screenplay tho joss whedon, andrew stanton, joel cohen aur alec soch ne likha hein aur us story ka base tho lasseter, pete docker, stanton aur joe ranf se likha hein aur voh executive produced hein steven jobs aur edward call ka
oh, interesting hein ki joss whedon ne iske liye write kiya
Haan wo kafi punch-ups karta hai
acha key scene hein yar
In a world jaha jaha toys bolte hain jo ki woh lifeless hain lekin humans ke nazar aa rahe hain, ek group of toys, owned by six-year-old Andy Davis, aur Slinky dog, jo ek scouting mission ke liye hai. Green army men, led by Sarge, party ko spy karte hai aur dusron ko peek hi monitors me aathe. Andy, uski mother aur infant sister Molly, ye week pe move karne pe prepare kar rahe hain. Toys' leader aur Andy ki favorite toy, ek pull-string cowboy doll jiska naam Sheriff Woody hai, jo ki woh ek actual space ranger hai.
kya yah actually kafi sad lagta hai
lekin wo koi bhi replace nahi karna chahta kyunki wo Woody ke saath bff ban jata hai

ek aur scene

aur key scenes
us new house mein woody aur buzz ko dusre reconnaissance mission karte hain new toy arrivals ke liye. jab woody aur buzz ko us rocket se nikalne mein usse bola aur usne us truck ko maarne ke baad us scene ko depleted kiya. woody ne buzz ko us rocket se nikalne mein usse chhod diya aur usne us rocket ko maarne ke baad us aur dusare toys ko us scene ko chod diya. woody ne us scene ko chod diya aur dusare toys ko chod diya, soch rahe the ki woody eliminated RC ko, aur usne us truck ko maarne ka.

Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice 2016
Maine kabhi dekhi nahi hai tumne?
ye ok hai, but bahut lamba hai
Cast: Ben Afleck Bruce Wayne/ Batmanman ke roop mein
Henry Cavil Clark Kent superman ke roop mein
Great actors kya tum agree nahi karte?
Movie kis baare mein hai?
aap jaanate hain, regular superhero film
Eighteen saal ke baad Superman aur General Zod ke battle ke baad Metropolis me, Superman ek controversial figure ban gaya hai.Billionaire Bruce Wayne Gotham City me as the vigilante Batman k two decades me, Superman humanity k liye ek existential threat tha.After Batman k Justice k liye learn kiya, Clark Kent use Daily Planet k articles me expose krne ki koshish krta hai. Wayne learn krta hai ki Russian weapon trafficker Anatoli Knyazev ne LexCorp mogul Lex Luthor se kontaktu hai. Meanwhile, Luthor unsuccessfully tries to persuade Senator June Finch ko use Indian Ocean se kryptonian ki terraforming attempt ki koshish krta hai, claiming ki wo use "deterrent" banata hai future Kryptonian threats ke liye. Usne instead Finch ke subordinate ke liye alternate plan banata hai aur gains access to Zod ki body aur Kryptonian k Kryptonian ko.
Kya tum normally is type ki movies dekhte ho?
Year Genre Director Rating 2016 SuperHero Zack Snyder 1. Rotten Tomatoes: 27% aur average: 4.9/10 2. Metacritic Score: 44/100 3. CinemaScore: B
Cast Ben Affleck as Bruce Wayne / Batman Henry Cavill as Clark Kent / Superman or Amy Adams as Lois Lane Jesse Eisenberg, Diane Lane, Laurence Fishburne, Jeremy Irons, Holly Hunter, aur Gal Gadot is 2016 American superhero film featuring the DC Comics characters Batman and Superman. Zack Snyder ne write kiya aur David S. Goyer ne write kiya, aur ek ensemble cast me Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Lex Luthor Diane Lane, Martha Kent ka upayog kiya. Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice pehli live-action film hai jo Batman aur Superman ko feature karti hai.
muje lagtha hein ki mein Iron man se stick karunga hahahaha
Superman ek saath live-action cinematic portrayal ki hai Wonder Woman ke liye. Film me, criminal mastermind Lex Luthor (Eisenberg) ne Batman (Affleck) ko Superman (Cavill) ke saath preemptive battle me manipulate kiya hai, joki Luthor apni own aspirations ke liye obsessed hai. Critical Response 153 minute ek grown man ko doll ko hacking kiya hai, kya movie ka definition changed hai 'motion picture story jo a human ne purpose se likha hai' to '700 ka tangentially related 12-second grey aur red vignettes? "The point of Batman v Superman fun nahi hai, aur ye soch nahi hai. It's obedience. Theology is invoked ... to buttress a spectacle of power. Aur is tarah is film uske liye ek metaphor ke liye hai.

AAP SAHI HAIN
Ye movie toys ke baare mein hai jo pretend nahi karte jab log around hote hai.
kya tumne aisi movie dekhi hai?
Ye do main characters different eras mein hain. Woody ek old-fashioned pull-string cowboy doll hai, while Buzz ek art astronaut toy hai jisme old fashioned analog technologies se प्रतिनिधित्व karta hai. Eventually do dost ban gaye aur message old hai ek naya can work together to make something even better than either of unhe.
Haan. kya tumne ye movie enjoy ki?
mein bhi.. disney pixar tho sab ko apne heart strings pulling ka experts hein
kya tumne movie enjoy ki?
ye ek movie that did that. Mujhe aisi movies pasand hai. Wo bachchon aur adults ke liye acche hai.
Exactly. Mujhe ye movie pasand aayi jab I was little, and still, mujhe ye pasand hai jab main adult hu.
muje bhi.. yeh classic movie hein, jo time tak stand kiye
Absolutely. Aakhir mein animation thoda outdated ho gaya aur naya movies tho aesthetically better rehega, lekin kabhee aise hota hai k classic Disney movies ka popularity surpass nahi hota
MEIN KABHI KOI KO NAHI MILA JO TOOTE STORY KO PASAND NAHI HEIN

Han, wo do America ki dads hain. Wo kaafi trustworthy voices hain.
Mujhe bhi lagta hai ki movie ke enjoyment me secondary characters jaise Mr. Potato Head aur Slinky dog really add karta hai. Wo aapko comic relief dete hai jo is movie me fun aur enjoyable banati hai.

nahi yar.. is kid ko dono character friendship ke liye ride karna chahiye. aap se sahamat hoon ki unhone common story plot ko banaya aur unko fresh banaya.. amazing hein yar, creators kaise itna amazing tarah se convey themes ke liye
ye clear he ki most log uske ratings par agree karte he, based on it. 100%, 9/10 aur 95/100. Everyone enjoys this movie.
haan.. muje lagtha hein ki, jab woody upset hein aur soch raha tha ki buzz ek favorite toy ban ja raha hein, logo ko is scene ko describe kartha.. woody tho us desk mein stuck hone ko try kartha
Exactly. Envy aur jealousy kafi human emotions hain. Unmes jisse viewers really relate kar sakte hai. Ye clear hai ki woody sirf replace nahi karna chahta aur ye sahi se clear hai jab sab toys birthday party mein recon operation set up kiya to ensure that the presents he receives don't replace them.
Mujhe lagta hai ki ye ek novial idea hai jab Buzz sochta hai ki wo ek real space ranger hai. Is story ko depth dena chahiye jo other plots mein nahi because wo unknowingly or other toys like him bana raha hai.
muje lagtha hein ki agar dusre toy ko soch rahe hein ki voh real cowboys, dinosaurs aur potatoes hein jab voh box mein aaye. lekin buzz apne guns ko stick kar raha hein aur buzz ko apne character break karke ya acknowledge karna refus kar raha hein ki voh space ranger nahi hein.
Mujhe lagta hai ki un sabhi ko sochne ki wo real cowboys he, etc. isse ye ek jyada dynamic thought process he.
muje bhi.. is movie ke end mein woody ne buzz ko fly nahi kar diya aur buzz bole "we're not flying were falling with style" implies karu ki voh space ranger nahi hein lekin toy hein. aur maybe sabhi toy ko is adjustment process mein jaatha hein

forced by kaun?
Main kehta hu 'forced.' Main character, Keanu Reeves ne play kiya gaya hai, usme crime bosses ka beta ko horribly treat kiya hai. As in, beaten up, uski car stolen, aur uska puppy maar diya. Unhe lagta hai ki wo ek nice car hai.
Mujhe Keanu Reeves acha lagta hai - aur wo interesting sound karta hai!
Tumhe kya kahta hai ki movie ka naam kya hai?
Ye John Wick kaha hai. Ye action-heavy hai, but isme kuch humor bhi hai. Lots of fun cameos bhi hai. Like Ian McShane and Willem Dafoe

Speaking of time, movie me Dream World ki sabse interesting cheez hai is the passage of time. Cobb's ka process dreams ko enter karne ke liye layers upon layers construct kar liya hai. The deeper you go down in the layers the less time real world me passes.

Dunkirk ek 2017 war film hai jise Christopher Nolan ne write kiya aur direct kiya aur co produced kiya hai jise Dunkirk evacuation ka perspective hai: land, sea aur air. Isme little dialogue hai, kyuki Nolan cinematography aur music se suspense create karne ki koshish karti hai. Filming may 2016 me Dunkirk me start tha aur baad me Los Angeles me end ho gaya. Cinematographer Hoyte van Hoytema ne film ko IMAX 65 mm aur 65 mm bada format film stock par shoot kiya. Dunkirk ek extensive practical effect hai, jo thousands of extras ko use kiya hai evacuation ka, aur period aeroplanes ka.

tumhe musical movies pasand hai?
Hi, musical ke liye depend karta hai but iski ek jazz pianist bhi hai to mujhe lagta hai ki ek musical bhi ek jazz pianist se sath hota hai jo bahut interesting hai. tumhe kya lagta hai musical drama aur romance k sath se teeta hai?
mujhe lagata hai ki yah philm ko emotional depth deta hai. lekin jyaadaatar sangharsh romaans ke roop mein rakhate hain.
Mujhe noticed hua ki yah movie kafi achi rating hai. Ye movie tumne dekhne me kya important hai?
Tum sahi te, mujhe lagta hai bahut saari musicals romance or emotional depth ke liye tie hai. Mujhe lagta hai musicals fantasy ke liye bhi tied hai, real life mein log singing nahi start karte, to mujhe ye idea lagta hai "La La Land" in part mein reality se out of touch ho jata hai musical se.
Ratings itni important nahi hai, because isme mixed ratings hai... some say ye pleasurable hai, dusra kehta hai it sags badly in the middle, so main apanee raay ko form karoonga.
ROTTEN TOMATOES NEH 92% DIYA? KYA AAP IS RATING KO trust KARTHE?
AAJ MEIN TOMATOES KO PASAND KARTHE LEKIN UNKA IMDB REPUTATION SE COMPARING KARTE. AAP IS MOVIE KE BASED PADTHE HO, KYA AAP IS BASED PADTHE HO?
*?
muje iMDB aur rotten tomatoes se experience nahi hein, lekin ratings ke baare mein kuch care nahi kartha.. muje us cast ko dekhna pasand hein aur plot bhi.. muje usme Ryan Gosling pasand hein, lekin Emma stone ke baare mein kuch crazy nahi huva.. plot tho interesting hein aur yeh comedy-drama bhi acha lagta.. kya aap blended genres enjoy karte?
Kyu tum IMDB rating se jyada agree karte ho?
Mujhe blended genres bahut accha lagta hai. Mujhe comedies, as well as dramas bahut accha lagta hai. Critics responses se yek lagta hai ye movie year ki sabse pleasurable entertainment hai. Given ki year 2016 ka release hogi kya tum agree karoge?

Wo kafi harsh sunai padta hai
The point of Batman v Superman fun nahi hai aur yahi sochne bhi nahi hai. It's obedience. The theology is invoked ... buttress a spectacle of power. Aur is tarah se film apni own aspirations ke liye metaphor serves karta hai. Aur yaha corporations aise movies churate hain aur ambitious hacks jo sign up to make them, have no evident motive beyond their own aggrandizement.

Hello kya tumne kabhi The Imitation Game dekhi hai?
maine nahi dekhi par mujhe pasand hai. Kya tumne dekhi hai?
Haan. Ye American historical drama film hai 2014 ki. Ye biography Alan Turing: The Enigma par based hai.
ye ek british cryptanalyist Alan Turing ke baare mein hai
Mujhe Alan Turing ke baare mein aur jyada learn karna accha lagega. Wo ek interesting person lagta hai
Wo German intelligence codes ko dikript kiya British Government ke liye during the second world war.
Maine suna hai ki movie plotline k sath kuch artistic license le li hai
haan main bhool gaya tha ki ye loosely true story par based hai
kuchh critics bole ki ye direction disappointing hai kyunki actual kahani mahaan hai
mujhe abhi bhi lagta hai ki yeh interesting hoga despite being a bit disappointing.
Haan. Rotten Tomatoes par ise 91% score mila aur Metacritic Score 73/100 tha.
Kya tum uski rating se agree karte ho?
main sahamat hoon kyonki yah entertaining tha.
Ye 1951 me start hoti hai so is time period ke baare me learn karne ka nice hai.
Wo usey 1927 mein dekhte hai jab wo young tha aur boarding school me bully kia.
ye hamesha history ke pieces ke baare me learn karne ka acha hai, jo aksar baare me nahin jaanatee hai ya discussed nahi kiya
haan, mujhe lagta hai hume history class bahut stupid hain aur sirf "approved" topics mein jaathe
Maine isse saare World War 2 cheejon dekhi hain lekin Turing ke baare mein kabhi sunna nahi.
Aur really sirf basics. Maine Alan Turing ke bare me suna hai but vaguely aur jyada detail se nahi
haan, coded messages toh war ka bad part hein
nazis ne "The Enigma machine" ko use kiya. voh usse break karne ko help kar raha tha
Oh haan, aapko badhiya advantage milta hai agar aap ko enemy ki kod ko decode karte hai.
voh machine ko christopher jaise kamaya try kar rahe the Nazi messages ko dikript karne ke liye
unhone us masheen ko destroy karne ki try kar rahe the, jab first time kaam nahi hua
sach mein voh enigma ko breaks karthe, lekin ve decide karthe ki voh every decoded message ko act nahi karthe ya ve jante ki unhe machine break hoga
yah dilachasp hai. isliye kaafi important act karna mushkil hoga.
aur ye decide karna ki act karna aur nahi karna
yah achchha hai ki yah film alan turing ke liye man aur christopher morcom ke liye pyaar mein jaata hai, jo machine ka last namit kiya jaata hai.

awesome! ye kis baare mein hai?
Ye ek optimistic rabbit Judy Hopps ka naam hai jiska kabhi dream hai ek police officer banne k liye Big city of Zootopia k liye kyunki wo child tha. Wo apni flying colors ki exams ko pasand karti hai but uski Chief doubt karti hai ki wo ek rabbit hai. Ek pehle din wo Nick Wilde the fox aur uska friend Finnick ka ek con artist duo meet karta hai. Movie uske liye uske liye khud ko prove krne ki koshish karti hai.
ye to interesting sound karta he.kya aise koi famous actors he characters ko voice karne ke liye?
Ginnifer Goodwin Judy Hopps ka role play karta hai. Jason Bateman Nick Wilde ka role play karta hai. Idris Elba Chief Bogo hai, Zootopia Police Force ka leader. Aur Jenny Slate Dawn Bellwether ka voice karta hai, Zootopia ka mayor ka diminutive sheep assistant.
Nice! Kya box office me acche perform kiya?
Main iske earnings ke baare mein sure nahi hu but critics se bahut accha lagta hai. Rotten Tomatoes pe 98% rating hai. Yeh ek well rounded thoughtful film hai jo ise viewers ko kuch sochne ke liye poocha tha jab woh animation enjoy ki thi.

The next day, uski partial remains shore par milte hai. Medical examiner ne uske maar diya gaya ki shark attack leads to Police Chief Martin Brody beaches ko closing. Mayor Larry Vaughn ne usse overrules kiya, fearing ki yah town ke summer economy ko barbad karega.

Han, ye ek trip tha

Kya tum higher ho. Wo drug-addled madness ki marathon tha aur wo hysterical tha.
mein maantha hoon.. Leonardo ne jordan ka role ko badiya job portraying kiya
is memoir ko jordan belfort ne likha hein
hello
The Wolf of Wall Street is 2013 ki American black comedy hai jise Martin Scorsese ne direct kiya aur write kiya hai, based on the memoir of the same name by Jordan Belfort. It recounts Belfort ki career as a stockbroker in New York City and how his company Stratton Oakmont ne Wall Street me rampant corruption aur fraud engage kiya that ultimately led to his downfall. Leonardo DiCaprio (who was also a producer) ne Belfort ka role kiya aur Jonah Hill ka role Donnie Azoff, Margot Robbie ne uski wife Naomi Lapaglia ka role aur Kyle Chandler ne Patrick Denham ka role, FBI agent jisne use maarne wala tha. Matthew McConaughey, Rob Reiner, Jon Favreau, Joanna Lumley aur Jean Dujardin bhi star hain.

Ok. is movie me other planets aur dimensions hein. Sci Fi sound karti he. Kya tumhe lagta he ki ye more Sci fi ya Fantasy genre hai? Ya alag genre?
Main kahunga drama, superhero genre aur sci fi aur fantasy elements. Avengers superheroes hain S.H.I.E.L.D. to take down extraterrestrials like these Chitauri.The superhero genre is movie ke honest me grow ho raha hai. Ye definitely superhero vs. villain complex hai. But aliens, aur dimensions/planets, ect give it the sci-fi element. Aur supernatural aspects bhi, tum fantasy add karoge. But again, main superhero drama us smaller elements se.
Main tumhe is movie ko dekhne ka recommend karunga, kyunki it's deep on many elements
Wo compelling sunai padta hai. Usme deep kya hota hai?
Well, tumhe different avengers milti hai wanting to approach the problems Loki ki Earth ko differently, which poses a separation in the group, providing ek aur element of drama. While wo sab argue karte hai, Barton aur Loki ki possessed agents ek or engine ko disabling kar dete hai, aur same time Hulk ek bada mess banata hai. Stark (Ironman) aur Rogers (Captain America) realize karte hai ki it is not only defeat Loki wants, wo overpower them aur take over Earth pubically.
Mujhe lagta hai bahut jyada happens karta hai. Is movie me bahut action hona chahiye. To Loki possessed agents hai. Can we do mind control?
ye un dono ko aage move karne ke liye work karne ke liye bring out karta hai. for instance, Starks aur Rogers ek saath engine ko run karne ke liye work karna chahiye. aur haan, wo most certainly terrasect or device sevig se work kar sakte hai new york city mein.
sevig kon hein?
Dr. Erik Selvig ek physicist hai jo Terrasect ko research karta hai tabse Loki ne use kiya aur Dr. Selvig ko enslave kiya. Use terrasect ko sceptre mein daalie people ko control karne pe. Unhone Chitauri ko uske liye ek machine bhi bana diya.

konsa state me ye take place huva?
konsa time of year me ye movie pe raho hai?
Ye South Carolina mein lee gayi hai. Main character, Noah ek 17 year old heiress Allie se love karne jaata hai. Unke pass summer love affair hai.
How romantic! Kya wo summer ke dauran relationship continue karte hai ya end karte hai! Kya is movie mein tragedy hai?
Allie is prevented by her parents Noah ko further dekhne ke liye. Do get in an argument and break up.
kaise sad! is movie mein twist hona chahiye
kya reason hai ki parents unhe ek-doosare dekh nahin dete?
Allie ki family end mein Charleston mein move ho jaata hai. Allie ki parents to Noah trash kehte hain. Overall critics kehte hain ki movie over-the-top romance craving ke liye accha hai. Overall ye overall rating zyada kam hai.

Movie badhiya gatsby hai!
kya tum uske bare me sunna chahoge?
haan mein bhi
ye 2013 mein bani thi
ye Baz Luhrmann dwara directed hai Romantic Drama hai
ROTTEN TOMATOES NE THO 48% DIYA AUR CIMASKA SORE B DIYA
Movie mein kaun play karta hai
Leonardo DiCaprio play karta hai Jay Gatsby, ek famous billionaire jisne wild parties banayega.
Tobey Maquire play karta hai Nick Carraway jo ki wanna be writer jis gatsby mein next door hai
carey mulligan plays daisy bulayaan, gatsby ka former lover
Emily Foreman play karta hai Pamela Buchanan
Aur Joel Edgerton ne Tom Buchanan ka play kiya jo upper class socialite he Gatsby ko hate karta he aur ab Dais se married he, Gatsby ka pura love
aapko is movie ka sabse jyada pasand hein
Mujhe yah ek period piece lagta hai, F. Scott Fitzgerald's 1925 ki based novel se based hai
kya aapako vaastav mein millionaire ka lavish lifestyle dekhana padega, jo roaring twenties mein hein
in newyork state me
Mujhe modern twist ki bahut pasand hai isme
Haan aur actors ne really movie banaya hai
lekin yeh important hein us literary agenda ko jaane ke liye agar aap ne book ko read kiya
Movie ka budget $190 million tha, aur mujhe lagta hai ye really shows karta hai
haan, jo actors they picked really movie kafi badiya thi
Movie actually 1931 me start hoti hai jahan Nick Carraway ek psychiatric hospital me help karne me jata hai, jahan wo Jay Gatsby se meet karta hai, jise vah maanata hai k wo sabse hopefuly man hai
voh toh write down karna start hota, jo 1922 mein movie start hota
Nick had moved from the midwest to New york jab abdoning his writing, aur house ko right next to Gatsby le kiraye
Nick ka cousin Daisy Buchanan hai, jo ki Tom Buchanana se married hai
aur gatsby jo nick daisy se pyar kar raha tha jo us water mein reh raha tha
Haan!
kya tum usually The Great Gatsby movie like karte ho?
haan, muje is tarah ka movies pasand hein.. especially voh books aur jyada pehele baar se based hein
muje bhi older movies ya older based movie dekhna pasand hein
ye book ke base pe aur ek Great Gatsby movie thi,wo 1974 me bani thi
Tom aur Gatsby ke sath kuch bada conflict hai. Gatsby ne daisy ko batata hai uska affair with Daisy, aur Tom ne gatsby ko utana gatsby ko attend nahi kiya aur bola ki mob se paisa kamaya
Daisy bolti hai ki she loves Gatsby, but cannot bring herself to say she never loved Tom
Wo eventually dono chhod dete hai
Mujhe ye issue thi Gatsby ki car se Myrtle ko hit karne se, lekin Nick ko realize hota ki Daisy Gatsby ki driver tha, Gatsby ne blame le liya.
Wo phir Nick ko bata deta hai ki uska real naam James Gatz tha aur wo born penniless tha, aur wo Daisy ko usey wait karna paaya jab tak wo something of himself banayi thi
sad love story ki tarah
haan
Lekin Gatsby George, Myrtles husband se shot aur mara hai, phir suicide karte hai.
Wo kafi sad ending tha

haan yar.. muje thoda clever tyooring pasand hein, jo decoding se bhi understand nahi kartha ki voh every decoded message ko act nahi kar sakthe ya aur germans ko yeh pata lagega ki unki codes broken hote
Wo scenes really filmmakers art dikhaya. Aapko kafi quicken kar sakta tha kyonki wo code breaking hone se jyada closer ho jaate hain aur tumhe kafi disappointment lagta hain jab wo failed huye. Aap vaastav mein soch rahe the ki wo unke saath Park mein the, ek crucial participant tha is historic moment mein.

Jab Elsa turns dvacet-one , wo Elsa ka crowned queen ban gaya hai Arendelle ke liye. Wo terrified hai ki kingdom ke citizens ko uske powers aur fear ke baare mein pata chal sakta hai. Castle mein pehli baar jaane wali dignitaries ko lekar hai. Unme se ek scheming Duke of Weselton, aur dashing Prince Hans of the Southern Isles hai, jisse Anna head-over-heels in love ho jaata hai.
MAIN intrigued hu
well Elsa ko hitch ke liye coronation hota hai, lekin wo abhi bhi Anna se distant hai. Jab Hans Anna ke liye propose karti hai, Elsa object karti hai, accidentally unleashing her powers court pe. Duke use monster brand karti hai. Elsa kingdom se chale jata hai, but uska magic Arendell mein ban jata hai. North Mountain se, Elsa ne crown ko disclaim karti hai aur ek palace ek solitary life create karti hai.

ice palace se, Anna Elsa ko meet karta hai, lekin jab usne reveal kiya ki Arendell ke liye kya hota hai, Elsa ko agitate ho jata hai, aur accidentally Anna ke heart ko freeze kar deta hai. wo ek giant snow creature Marshmallow ko summons karta hai, jisne Anna, Kristoff aur Olaf ko chase kar deta hai. Anna ka hair white ho jata hai, so Kristoff Anna ko trolls, uski adoptive family se milta hai. Grand Pabbie reveal karta hai ki Anna ko freeze kar jata hai. Hans aur uske men Elsa ke palace ko reach kar dete hai, Marshmallow ko lekar aur Elsa ko Capturing krta hai.Anna Hans se deliver kar jata hai, but rather than kissing her, usne reveal kiya ki voh actually Arendell ke throne ko seize karne mein plan kiya hai. Ye dekhne me interesting hai ki kaise wo penny stocks se end tak small fortune ke liye jaata hai
Oh, to wo small penny stocks se start karti hai aur through corruption or taking advantage of the loops within the system wo paisa kamaya hai. Interesting
Haan, wo super aggressive hai in his selling, to wo ranks se quickly move karta hai
I guess being a go-getter is what made him super aggressive and hence allows him to move quickly up the ranks.
Wo khud ke liye money making karne lag rahi hai, to greed is certainly motivating factor hai.
Self ek human being ke liye greatest motivator hai. To just apne aap ko apne liye aur greedy ke liye kamaya, usko small time se paisa kamaya hoga. Ye sirf bahut jyada intriguing hoga.
aur jab usne small stock place mein kafi paisa kamaya tha tab tak wo bhag jaati aur apni own firm ko open kiya aur shady stuff bhi kar sakta tha
kya yek corrupt guy hein... voh small stock place se aa raha hein jahan shady deals ko karke jarur hoops aur loops dalna chahiye... tho voh apni corruption se unrestricted ho sakta tha... voh wickedness hein
aur wo sab kuch young brokers ko mil jata hai uske liye work karne ke liye
ye ab bhi young brokers ko misleading kar raha hai aur unhe as corrupt banna dete hai, dusre level of wickedness
haan, badhiya dude nahi. usne apni wife ko cheating kiya aur phir us mistress ko marrying kiya
uska corruption apni family ke liye bhi extend ho jata hai? ... wo apni wife ko cheat karti hai aur apni mistress ko marri kar deta hai kyunki wo kar sakte hai? is movie mein kahi logo ko astray kar deta hai
She ends up divorcing him though
At least she gets her freedom from him through a divorce, good for her.
Wo end mein bhi arrest ho jata hai aur Firm shut down ho jata hai jab uske partner uske paas rats rats rats pe rahta hai
Finally is whole story me justice hai. To uska partner actually rats karta hai aur use arrest kiya jata hai aur shady firm is closed, ye is what I call poetic justice.
agar sirf uska punishment thoda harsh tha, voh prison me nahi tha

Ye accha, thanks. To ye movie Despicable Me he, jisme Steve Carell ek mean supervillain he, Gru, aur Jason Segel Victor ke roop me tha, Gru ka archenemy.
Movie ko Rotten Tomatoes par 81% aur CinemaScore par A score kiya hai, ye definitely dekhne layak hai!
mein is movie ke baare mein suna hoon, aapka kya khayal hein?
mujhe lagta hai yeh interesting aur fun tha, aur mujhe lagta hai positive ratings reflect that.
Main to agree karta hun. Maine sirf uske baare me acchi cheejon suna hai. Mera beta ne dekha hai, but me nahi.
ye bacho aur adults ke liye achhi movie hai, aur definitely ek worthwhile expenditure hai! Critics kehte hain ki "kids will dig it, aur adults tho amusement se smile karte"!
kaafi cool sunai padta hai! Mere beta isse baare me baat karti hai jab wo pahalee baar use dekha. Ye definitely mera to do list me hai.
tumhare opinion me movie ka theme kya hai?
Mujhe lagta hai movie hero ki journey ke masterplot ko follow karte hai, jaha audience Gru ko follow karti hai in his attempt to achieve a long term goal of shrinking the moon.
Tumhe kya lagta hai story me hero ki journey me masterplot involving hoga?

Wo animation phenomenal tha. Wo unbelievably realistic tha. Aur Mujhe Steve Carell ka Gru play Gru nahi pata. Ab main definitely dekhunga. Lol

Well, kuch major cheez hai. Ek di jo sirf hindsight aur reflection ke sath clear hota hai. Batman bahut reactionary storyline hai. Yah ek rich guy ke baare mein hai jo apne anxieties lene ke liye criminals ko hands lene ki koshish krta hai. Which hai... bahut troublesome narrative hai, but bhi. Bale ka vision mein, reactionary thread bhi stronger ho jata hai. Ye ek bahut right-wing film series hai, jo mujhe bahut thrill nahi krta.
Kya is movie ka original Batman theme song hai?

Yeah. ye real story pe based hai. Guy ko Wall Street me job mil jata hai (in a firm, LF Rothchild) jo mera best friend ki dad apne me work kiye hai. Use fire ho jata hai aur LI me boiler room start karta hai, jahan mujhe bada hua.
Oh mujhe lagta hai ki is life ke sath kafi things in common thi. It's interesting though. Bilkul se zyadatar films Wall Street ek bada part mein feature nahi ki story ke liye.
Well, wo basically penny-stock scam artist hai. Private life sab sex and drugs hai. Oddly, my friend's wife next door to him grew up!
I see! So definitely apni whole family ko show karne ke liye movie nahi hai.
Ye Wall Street ka underbelly hai. Main used to work at Solomon Bros. But frankly regular belly itni bhi clean nahi hai. Steal ahai aur wo tumhe jail me daal dete hai, steal bahut hai aur wo tumhe king bana dete hai

Jab Elsa turns twenty-one , wo Elsa ke crowned queen ban jata hai Arendell ke liye. Wo bohat terrified hai ki kingdom ke citizens ko uske powers ke baare mein pata chal jata hai aur uske liye kabhi kabhi bhi nahi mil jata. Jab Hans Anna ke liye propose karta hai, Elsa object karta hai, accidentally unleashing powers before the court. Duke use ek monster brand karta hai. Elsa kingdom se fliegta hai, lekin uska magic Arendell ke liye ghante lagta hai. Hello!
To waise ek movie hai jo tumhe ideas lene ke liye bataya hai, ek dream ke liye, in order to manipulate you into making a decision in real life.
voh whole concept tho mera understanding level se alag lag raha hein, lekin definitely mein interesting hoon
Movie ke reviews average se jyada honge aur mujhe lagta hai ki har kisi ne movie ko awesome lagta. However, ek aisa jho ke pass bhi who didn't enjoy the movie at all! But ye shayad because wo itni nahi samajh aati!
Leonardo DiCaprio isme hai aur ek critic ne kaha ki ye abhi tak ki best performance hai.
To movie me DiCaprio ki character is tasked with going into the mind of some heir to a company and implanting the idea for him to dissolve that company. Public eye me heir already some business move decide kiya tha but powers that be don't want that outcome and desire the company dissolved. Enter Leo DiCaprio!
Ye heir toh company ko dissolve karne ke liye sueded ho jayega jab Leo apne mind mein dream ke saath enter kar deta hai, kaafi outcome mil jata hai. I mean imagine agar tumne ek minute ka Decision bana liya. Nap or woke up kiya aur completely changed your mind and decided to do the opposite but ye kahi hein.
puri concept crazy hai, but intriguing hai. Tumhe wonder hoga ki isme dangers kya hai.
aur phir movie mein bhi, is stated kiya hein ki Leo ka character is task ko achieve kar sakte hein apne shared dream world ke liye
I wonder agar subject ko pata hai k unki mind is being invaded aur fights back through subconscious?! Would ye awesome to see play out in the movie!?
The movie is called inception and is directed by Christopher Nolan. Uski Dark Knight Batman trilogies meri absolute favorite movies hain. To wonder hi nahi hota inception ko ache reviews mile.
Movie mein kaee bade actors hain, Joseph Gordon Levitt aur Ellen Page aur Tom Hardy.
muje action sequences is movie mein pasand hein
ye definitely ek movie thi jo aapko attention dena chahiye jarur understand karne ke liye lekin concept unique aur intriguing hai

ye superhero film hai Marvel ka team of heroes ke bare me, ye team of heroes, Iron man, Captain America, the Hulk aur Thor ke baare me hai, aur unka objective Thor ka brother, Loki ko endangering Earth me rokne k liye hai. Ye kafi acchi tarah received hai, aur mere opinion me acchi humor bhi hai. Aap kya sochte ho?
Ye ek achhi movie ke tarah sound karta he,uske pass kaun hai in it?

Kya ham kuch aur conversation start karna padega?
main nayi documents pad raha hoon, lekin mujhe pata hai ki agar aap film dekhne ko consider karte hain to iska metacritic score 70 hai, lekin rotten tomatoes par 92% hai, isliye ise bahut achchha mila hai. Hawkeye kon hai? Main superhero movies ka huge fan nahi hu, Spider-Man ke alawa
Mujhe lagta hai hawkeye ek archer of sorts hai, bow wielding. Additionally, film me lots of humor hai, aur Iron Man is big player in this.
Ye accha hai, as mene kaha ki mujhe Iron man pasand hai. Is movie me Robert Downey ke alawa kaun hai?
Well, Jeremy Renner Hawkeye play karta hai aur Scarlett Johansson is film me as I said, Black Widow play karta hai. Ye film ek old hoti hai, ye 2012 mein ayi thi aur Loki and Clint Barton evil hai, Clint Barton Hawkeye hone. Mujhe lagta hai Hawkeye film me Loki ka enslave kiya gaya hai.
Mujhe Scarlett Johansson bhi bahut pasand hai. Kya Black Widow ek arch villan hai?
Mujhe lagta hai ki woh ek agent me se hai, lekin mujhe yakeen nahin hai ki woh Iron Man ke team me hai. Woh ek Black suit pe jata hai aur usse hero ya former hero hai mere knowledge me. Waha charac ter hai.

to kya aap is movie ki sifarish karoge

Stark escape karne ke baad uski company charity event hold karta hai. Stark ko ek reporter se informed kiya ki uski company has been selling weapons to the terrorist group, The Ten Rings. Wo use these weapns attack karne ke liye Yinsen ghar par attack karte hai.
Stark bohot mortified hai. Wo learn karta hai k uski assistant Stane us illegals ke paas back trafficking weapons par ja raha hai. Wo quickly ek naya aur improved body suit idea chalta hai jo eventually Ironman mein turn ho jata hai.
voh new armors ko throw kartha aur afghanistan ke villagers ko save kartha
On his way back, do fighter jets us sky mein notice karte hain aur use shoot kar dete hain. Rhodes ko pata chalta hai ki yeh suit wahi Tony hai.
Meanwhile, Ten Rings ne sab pieces ko gather kar diya jab Tony escape huyi or Stane se converse kar sakte hain apne own suit ko bnane ke liye.
Pepper end mein discover kar raha tha ki Stane Tony ke against he aur uske liye initially Ten Rings hired tha use maarne ke liye

Hello, hum aaj kal movie Inception ke baare mein baat kar rahe hain.
sach mein? kya yah achchha hai?
Ye Rotten Tomatoes aur IMDB par highly rated hai, dono 80% ke uper same. Ye ek complex futuristic mind control technology ke baare mein acchi kahani hai.
Interesting. Usme kaun hai? Anyone good?
Ye kafi bada naam hai. Leonardo DiCaprio lead hai, aur supporting actors hai Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and Ellen Page. Ye sab bahut achhi hain movie me.
muje leonardo dicaprio ka newer work pasand hein. voh bahut badiya hein.. voh thoda better hein.. muje nahi patha hein, kya yeh action movie hein?
sabase plot toh hai ki ek technology hai jo dusre ke mind mein enter kar sakte hai, aur ka idea title, Inception, toh potentially kisi ke subconscious thought ko spark kar sakte hai jo ages ke liye chalenge.
isme Joseph Gordon-Levitt kaafi cheez mein gya tha, lekin sabse jayada jayada hai kid tho long hai aur sitcom me Third rock from the sun ka sabse jayada known hai. Ellen Page kaafi young age mein acting kiye movies me tha, aur bahut romantic comedy type ki tarah.
Wow, ye ek interesting flick lagti hai. Aisa lagta hai ki yeh plot ko follow karna mushkil hai. Kaafi complicated lagti hai. Maine Third Rock From the Sun nhi dekhi. Main bhi romantic comedies mein bada nahi hu. Maine suna hai ki wo good hai Juno mein, but maine kabhi dekhi nahi hai
ye ek movie hai jo kuch thought ke liye hai. Jab wo scenes me hai wo bahut complicated ho jati hai jiske sath shared dream world me hai. Bolna mushkil hai ye batana kya real hai ki nahi.
shared dreaming? voh pretty hein. muje aise movie pasand hein jo thought ke liye thoda jarurat hein, tho mein right mood mein hein
ye bahut interesting hai ki kaise unhone kisi ki head mein simple notion plant ki try karte hai, jo later down the road person ko specific action lene ke liye lead kar lete hai.
kya ve ideas plant karne ke liye drugs ya machines ki tarah karte hai ya is it all done with the mind, like psychically?
Mujhe lagta hai wo person kidnap kar dete aur sedate kar dete hai, aur kuch machine use kar deta hai apne mind ko hook karne ke liye
Jab unhone shared dreaming thing kiya, kya unhone sabhi machine ko hook up kiya? Jab wo machine se hook up hote hain, kya unhone log ko assassinate kiya like in the Manchurian Candidate?
ye bahut complicated hoga jab team person ki dream duniya mein enter kar leta hai. Unmein sabhi ko risk kar sakte hai jo unhe forget karne me fool banne k liye nahi hota. Usme person ki dream ke liye level depth hai aur sab deeper riskier hoti hai
Wo different dream level me jate hai? Wo bahar kaise milte hai? Kya wo outside ki koi help karte hai?
ye jyada gently subconscious suggestions jaisa hai. Lekin wo ultimately bohat rich man ko apni huge company ko separate divisions me rakhna chahta hai aur wo ye apni mind me plant seeds of doubt plant karte hain kisi ke baare me or situation me
Haan, mujhe lagta hai ek team member hai jisne outside par stay kar deta hai un sab ko safe banaane aur sab ko monitor kar deta hai.
kyon voh company ko split karna chatha hein?
haan muje lagtha hein ki yeh us takeover ke liye thoda kam hein. usme bhi ye issue bhi hein jo unhen dream mein lost ho jaayega, aur kahi unhen pehle bhi itna lucky escape ho jaatha, is risk toh badiya hein
muje lagtha hein ki voh tho aise hota hein ki voh dream mein hi stay karthe aur voh forget karthe ya real world ko forget forget karthe
Mujhe lagta hai ki dream world mein time bahut different hai. Main character aur uska girlfriend ek baar usme trapped ho gaye aur uske liye 50 year lifetime ji gayi. Jab wo eventually aaya eventually wo use reality par maar diya, wo maar diya or maar diya. To wapas me dangers really serious hai.
Wow. ye deal karna mushkil hai. Aapko seriously kisi aur ke dream me jaane ke liye risk weigh karna padega aur kisi aur ke dream me jaane ka plant ka ideas ko. Aur wo ye obvious ethical dilemma bhi hai ki aap kisi aur ke dream me jaane ke liye risk nahi kar sakte.
Bahut sahi. I guess ye movie itni achi hai. So many complex ethical issues. Anyways, agar tumne nahi dekhi to, to chaahie!
Mujhe lagta hai mujhe isey some time check karna padega!

The Imitation Game is a gripping drama about World War 2.
Indeed, and ye lagta hai ki ye well received score hai jiska CinemaScore aur MetaCritic se judging score mil gaya hai.
reviews well earned hain. Benedict Cumberbatch ne Alan Turing ka role bohot sell kiya aur viewer ko lekar.
mein maantha hoon, aur critical responses se judging, aisa lagta hai ki cumberbatch ka performance piece ka lynchpin hein. voh ache received hein jab historical figures ko portray kiya
Keira Knightly ek aur bade naam star hai jo The Imitation Game mein acche perform karta hai. Unke charm aur eagerness sath me work karne ke liye apparent hai.
The other star actors Goode and Goodman-Hill bhi bhool nahi sakta, entire A-list set actors really badiya cohesion se saath me aati hai, positive response se proven hai.
lagta hai ki director Morten Tyldum ne source material mein kuch liberties le liya, wo all star cast aur compelling drama ko brings together karta hai thrilling tale ko weave karne ke liye.
Indeed, it is dangerous to attempt to bring a biopic into the limelight aur general box office; but ye film performed well, aur Tyldum's gamble paid off usse handsomely
