Yes. Batman ek drug shipment ko intercept karta hai jo wo Rachel ko lekar aur honest cop james Gordon ne Falcone ke against evidence ko james kiya hai. Jail me, Falcone Dr. Jonathan Crane se meet karta hai, jo Gotham City mein drugs lene ke liye complicit hai. Falcone ne use involvement reveal karna chahta hai, but Crane ek Scarecrow mask pe daal deta hai aur Falcone ko use incapacitate ho jata hai aur mindlessly scarecrow ka word repeat karta hai.

Tom Hanks woody ka role play karta hai, ek pull-string cowboy doll aur Tim Allen as Buzz Lightyear, ek space ranger action figure.
Don Rickles aur Jim Varney dono hi in it play as Mr. Potato Head aur Slinky dog, respectively.
Mujhe dono actors pasand hai.
plot kis baare mein hai?
In a world jaha jaha toys bolte hain jo ki woh lifeless hain lekin humans ke nazar aa rahe hain, ek group of toys, owned by six-year-old Andy Davis, aur Slinky dog, jo ek scouting mission ke liye hai. Green army men, led by Sarge, party ko spy karte hai aur dusron ko peek hi monitors me aathe. Andy, uski mother aur infant sister Molly, ye week pe move karne pe prepare kar rahe hain. Toys' leader aur Andy ki favorite toy, ek pull-string cowboy doll jiska naam Sheriff Woody hai, jo ki woh ek actual space ranger hai.

wonder women movie - director-patty jenkins- 2015 ka year
wonder woman hi DC comics character se based hai
Wonder Woman is a 2015 ki American superhero film based on the DC Comics character of the same name, distributed by  Warner Bros. Pictures. Iss fourth installment in the DC Extended Universe (DC) me. Film me Patty Jenkins ne direct kiya, with a screenplay by Allan Heinberg, and story me Heinberg, Zack Snyder, aur Jason Fuchs. Aur gal gadot ne Wonder Woman ka role kiya Chris Pine, Robin wright, Danny Huston, David Thewlis, Connie Nielsen aur Elena Anaya.
Wonder Woman feature film ke liye development 1996 me start hui, producer aur possible director se Ivan Reitman adhering hai
In 2015, Patty Jenkins ne Wonder Woman direct karne ke liye offer ki hai, screenplay par Allan Heinberg ne likha hai aur ek story co-written hai jiska Heinberg, Zack Snyder, Geoff Johns aur Jason Fuchs ne likha hai. Is version mein, Gadot stated that,
Yearning a total of $103.3 million tha us opening weekend mein, is film ne number of records ko record kiya: sabhi domestic opening of all time for a female director (up par Fifty Shades of Grey se sam Taylor-Johnson se surpassing previous record holder ki fifty), sabse bada DC Comics release without Batman or Superman (ahead of Constantine) ki sixth-biggest comic book superhero debut ever, as well as sixth-biggest June debut weekend.
Wonder Woman, Shanghai mein pehle May 15, 2017, and was released in the United States on June 2, 2017, 2D, 3D aur IMAX 3D. It received largely positive reviews from critics, with praise for its performances (particularly Gadot aur Pine), direction, action sequences, aur musical score.
A sequel is set to be released on November 1, 2019 with Jenkins aur Gadot reprising their roles as director and lead role respectively.
Wo team learn karta hai ki gala will be held at the nearby German High Command. Steve aur Diana ne party infiltrate karte hain, with Steve intending to gas aur destroy karke, while Diana ne Ludendorff ko maarne ka plan ki hai, believing ki wo Ares hai aur thus killing him will end the war. Steve use jeopardize karne ke liye stop karta hai, but ye umožňuje Ludendorff to unleash the gas on Veld, killing its inhabitants.
Ye Hippolyta ka sister, General of the Amazonian army, Diana ka aunt aur mentor tha. Film cast karne ke liye, Wright kaha ki, "ye do-fold hai because jab Patty Jenkins ko director ne bulaya, to ye three minute conversation tha. Usne Wonder Woman ke bare mein bol raha hai. Kya tum uske trainer chahoge? Aur mujhe aisa lag raha tha, 'Yes. Ofcourse.' aur Amazonian army ka general.
Ye Amazon Queen ka Themyscira aur Diana ka mother tha.[36] Usne role k liye director se meeting ki, Nielsen kaha, "Patty and I met in London, and we just hit it off from the get-go. Hum baat nahi kar sakta. Ye ek one-hour meeting mein turn ho gaya tha aur ham ek do-and-a-half-hour lunch mil gaya.
In late 2013, Zack Snyder ne Wonder Woman ki role me gal gadot ko cast kiya tha 2016 ke film me, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice over lodie yung aur Olga kurylenko.[116][117][118][119] Kuch fans gal gadot ke appearance ko criticize karte hain.
Director Patty Jenkins, jo interview ke questions mein respond kiya: "let's talk a bit about Gal. Tumne use Zack Snyder se inherit kiya. Kya tumhe Wonder Woman choose karna itna mushkil laga?" aur "gal ke baare mein kya hota that makes her such a good fit?"
Wonder Woman is subject of a discussion regarding female power in general aur female action heroes ka particular.since uska initial appearance Sensation Comics me, kyunki wo "power of women" document karne ke liye created hai aur "a golden tiara, red bustier, blue underpants aur knee-high, red leather boots" khel rahe hai
finish
. kya tum movie ki rating se agree karte ho?
The petition stated ki "it is alarming that the United Nations would consider using a character with an overtly sexualised image jabki headline news me United States aur world me news me objectification of women aur girls hai".[243][244][240] Wonder Woman director Patty Jenkins dono respond kiya dono the petition and U.N. decision ka stating that she thinks "that is sexist.

The Blind Side is 2009 ki American Biographical sports drama film hai jise John Lee Hancock ne write aur direct kiya hai, based on the 2006 ki book The Blind Side: Evolution of a Game by Michael Lewis.[1][2] Story me Michael Oher ek offensive lineman hai jo NFL me Baltimore Ravens se draft ki thi. Film me Oher uski apni impoverished upbringing, through Wingate Christian School (a fictional representation of Briarcrest Christian School in Memphis, Tennessee)[1][2] uska adoption Sean aur Leigh Anne Tuohy ki, college football me sabse coveted prospect banna, phir finally first round pick banna

Yes! ye bahut inspirational aur uplifting movie hai--about do log apne dreams se touch karte hai
kya tum mujhe movie ke bare me outline mila?
tum vaha abhi tak ho?
Movie ek aspiring jazz pianist, Ryan Gosling, aur ek aspiring actress, Emma Stone ke baare mein hai. Unme Los Angeles me milte aur love me pad jaate hain--lekin samay unme dreams ko choose kare. Ye apna dreams ko love karne ke liye prospect ke baare mein hai--because life sab timing ke baare mein hai.

haan, ek aisa aadmi jo wicked, supervillain Gru (Steve Carell) ne moon ko steal karne ka plan hatch kiya. Gru ek army of little yellow minions aur uske impenetrable arsenal of weapons aur war machines ke saath vanquish karne k liye ready he. Lekin uske calculations aur groundwork mein kuch nahi prepared he uske greatest challenge k liye: three adorable orphan girls (Miranda Cosgrove, Dana Gaier, Elsie Fisher) jo ki unake dad banane mein chahta he.

ye ek aur key lines hai movie mein. Gru aur ladkiyoon dono vector ke fortress mein aa jaate hain aur gru ne shrink ray ko steal kiya. ladkiyoon ne us girls ko ek theme park me aa jaate hain aur gru usko us ladkiyoon ko construct karne ke liye parts offer karata hai. gru, inspire ki, us ladkiyoon ko steal karne ke liye parts ko sell karata hai. gru, plan mein interfering hota hai, aur dr. nefario, us girls ka recital ko interfering kiya, aur perkins ne uska orphanage ko return karne ke liye arrangements kiya. pehle gru perkins ko video chat se diya jata hai ki usme shrink ray hai. gru, plan mein interfering hota hai, lekin us girls ko usme warm up kiya. pehle gru perkins ko video chat se diya jata hai ki usme shrink ray hai aur vector ka adoption kiya

ye movie kis baare mein hai?

Hello there. Hum jis movie k baare me discuss kar rahe ho Zootopia
Hi! Zootopia kis baare mein hai?
Zootopia ek anthropomorphic mammals ke baare mein hai, especially rabbit Judy Hopps jiska naam Judy Hopps hai. Woh ek academy valedictorian tha jab police officer banna lekin wo actual police officer banna problems hai. For example, usne park mein parking duty kiya jata hai unhone use potential nahi dekha
Judy kisne play kiya hai
Judy ko Ginnifer Goodwin ne play kiya hai.
Aur kaun hai is movie mein

Idris Elba police chief ka role play karta hai. Aur Jenny Slate ek sheep ka role play karta hai jo Zootopia ka assistant meyor hai

Well, Bruce Nolan (Jim Carrey) ek television field reporter hai aur Eyewitness News ke liye WKBW-TV mein Buffalo, New York, lekin news anchorman hona chahta hai. Bruce, apni bad luck se suffer karta hai. Bruce ek breaking point mein hota hai jab wo apni rival, Evan Baxter (Steve Carell) se pradarshan kar jata hai aur ek unaired segment ko steal kar jata hai jab Bruce air mein promotion accept kar jata hai. Monster's University ke baare me baat karte hai

Monsters University is a 2013 ki American 3D computer-animated comedy film produced by Pixar Animation Studios for Walt Disney Pictures.[6] Ye dan scanlon ne direct kiya aur Kori rae ne produce kiya tha, John Lasseter, Pete Docter, Andrew Stanton aur Lee Unkrich ne executive producers ki role.
is film ka music Randy Newman ne compose kiya gaya hein, jo uska seventh collaboration he Pixar se.
isme kaun sitaare hain
Billy Crystam Michael "Mike" Wazowski ke rup me
John Goodman as James P. "Sulley" Sullivan
Steve Buscemi Randall "Randy" Boggs ke rup me
Helen Mirren as Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, the chair of the Scarer program at Monsters University
thik hai. dhanyavaad
Peter Sohn Scott "Squibbles" Squibbles ke roop mein, ek Oozma Kappa fraternity member
is film ka music Randy Newman ne compose kiya gaya hein, jo uska seventh collaboration he Pixar se.
Ye Pixar ki fourteenth feature film thi, aur is a prequel to 2001's Monsters, Inc., marking the first time Pixar ne prequel film banaya hai.[7]
Monsters University ne do monsters ka story bola hai, Mike and Sulley, aur apni time college me study kar rahe hain, jahan wo rivals ban jaate hain lekin baki dost ban jaate hain
John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi, Bob Peterson, aur John Ratzenberger ne roles as James P. Sullivan, Mike Wazowski, Randall Boggs, Roz aur Abominable Snowman reprise kiya hai respectively. Bonnie Hunt, who first film me Ms. Flint play kia, Mike ki grade school teacher Ms. Karen Graves.

Critical Response
is spirit of monsters sach hein, aur unka tone matches hein.. lekin kabhi old ground nahi hota
isme sahi stuff hai jo kabhi imagination ko haunt karege jab immediate buzz of its fluffy-furred cuteness melt away ho gaya. mere prequel ke liye ye result hai.
is cute, aur funny hai, aur animation bhi, haalaanki itna bhi inspired nahi hai, certainly colorful hai.
ye safe, predictable, edge-free, nearly bland effort hai jo studio ne rarely bets hedges kiya
key scenes..
Michael "Mike" Wazowski, ek 7-year-old monster jo ki hai, aspire karta hai ek scarer ek monster jo ek human world me enter kar deta hai aur khud ko scare karne ke liye kam deta hai jab wo Monsters Inc., Monstropolis ka sabse profitable scaring company, pehli school field trip pe jata hai.
Ye saal pahale, Mike ek pehle-year scare major hai Monsters University mein, jahan wo fellow monster, James P. "Sulley" Sullivan se meets karta hai.
Mike hard studies karta hai, while Sulley bohat privileged family se hai, jo talented scarers se coming hai, use sirf natural ability pe relieve karta hai aur shuruaat mein falter leta hai
As semester progress ho rahi hai, Mike aur Sulley ne ek fraternity join karne ki attempt ki hai, lekin sirf Sulley ne Roar Omega Roar mein accept kiya, campus mein strongest fraternity hai.
is semester ke final exam mein, donon ka fight causes them to accidentally break Dean Abigail Hardscrabble's cherished Scream Can.
Hardscrabble un dono ko immediately hara deta hai, Sulley ne bahut study nahi kiya aur Mike scary nahi hai
Great

haan, mene first film ko bahut enjoy kiya aur mujhe yakeen hai ki mene sequel pasand karega.
aur key scenes
Ye prove krne ki khatma hai, Mike university k "Scare Games" mein enter karta hai aur Hardscrabble se wager karta hai usey reinstate karne ke liye or uski team ko scare program k liye, lekin Mike university chale jata hai agar wo lose hote
Wo ek misfits ka group join karta hai Oozma Kappa, campus k weakest fraternity hai, lekin wo Games k short tak ek team member banni karte hai
short. Sulley subsequently joins unhe, competition dekhne ke liye uska ticket scare program mein
Oozma Kappa ne pehli challenge mein finish kiya, lekin elimination se bachaane ke baad dusri team ne cheating karne ke liye disqualify kiya jata hai
cheating. Oozma Kappa mushkil ho jata hai kyonki Mike ki training aur intricate knowledge of scaring hai, aur ve har din ek challenge k peeche se advance karte hai, finishing just Roar Omega Roar pe.
final round mein, voh roar omega roar ko defeat karthe, unme ka final scare mike ke saath simulation bedroom mein
however, mike ko jab discover hota hai ki vah sirf machine ke difficulty se tampered kiya gaya hein
Monsters University is a 2013 ki American 3D computer-animated comedy film produced by Pixar Animation Studios for Walt Disney Pictures.[6] Ye dan scanlon ne direct kiya aur Kori rae ne produce kiya tha, John Lasseter, Pete Docter, Andrew Stanton aur Lee Unkrich ne executive producers ki roles me composed kiya tha. Film ka music Randy Newman ne composed kiya aur uska seventh collaboration Pixar se banaya tha. Ye 2001 ki monsters ki prequel film hai aur uska first time ki Pixar ne ek prequel film banaya tha. John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Bob Peterson, aur John Ratzenberger ne roles me roles me reprise kiya, Mike Wazowski, Randall Boggs, Roz aur Abominable Snowman ka voices Mike's grade school teacher karen Graves hain.
Disney, as the rights holder, had plans for a sequel to Monsters, Inc. since 2005. Pixar ke saath disagreement ho gaye, Disney ne Circle 7 animation ke liye task kiya tha film ko banane ke liye.[8] Ek pehle draft developed huyi; however, Disney's Pixar ka purchase early 2006 me Circle 7 ki version ko cancellation k liye tha film ka.[9]
Monsters University peskai June 5, 2013 mein BFI Southbank mein debut kiya tha, England mein, aur June 21, 2013 mein rileej kiya gaya tha. Ye theaters mein ek short film, The Blue Umbrella, se accompanied kiya tha, Saschka Unseld ne direct kiya tha. Film ka budget $744 million tha, isse se 2013 ka 7th highest-grassing film hai[1][2]
Michael "Mike" Wazowski, ek 7-year-old monster, aspire karta hai ek scarer ek monster banna aur khud ko scare karne k liye human world mein enter karke aur khud ko scare karne k liye jab wo Monsters Inc., Monstropolis ka sabse profitable scaring company, pehli school field trip pe jata hai. Eleven saal baad, Mike ek pehla-year scare major hai Monsters University mein, jahan wo fellow monster, James P. "Sulley" Sullivan se meet karta hai. Mike bahut zyada study nahi krta aur Mike bahut scary nahi hai.
usse prove kar raha tha, Mike "Scare Games" mein enter karta hai aur Hardscrabble se wager karta hai usey and his team ko scare program me reinstate karne ke liye, lekin Mike ke training aur intricate knowledge scaring se improve karega, aur ek challenge k peeche se pahle Roar Omega Roar ko defeat kar jata hai. Lekin pehle Mike ko pata chalta hai k Sulley ne machine ke difficulty ko improve kiya.
ground." "isme kafi sahi stuff hai jo mujhe imagination ko haunt karti hai jab immediate buzz of its fluffy-furred cuteness melt away ho gaya. mere prequel ke liye ye result hai." "is cute, aur funny, aur the

Movie kis baare mein hai? I am looking to watch a movie with my kids this weekend, but want to make sure it is a kid friendly movie.
Ye ek animated film hai jo dono kids aur adults dono ke liye achhi hai. Ye ek fantasy film hai jo ek man aur dragon ke friendship ke baare mein involve karta hai.
Sounds like a movie that my children aur me dekhna pasand karenge. Kya ye fairly new movie hai ya kuch samay ke liye bahar hai? I am assuming the man dragon ko train karta hai, but ye training kis baare me hai?
yeh 2010 mein banaya gaya hein, thoda samay ke liye out hota hein, lekin yehda outdated nahi hein.. muje patha nahi ki usne dragon ko kaise train kiya, lekin yeh book se based hein
I see, mujhe wonder hoga ki agar mujhe book pahle kamaya chahiye. Main ye nahi karta kyunki ye book mere liye ruin karega. Ye movies mujhe book se milne k liye itna details ya feelings nahi capture kar dete. Well main definitely movie ek try karna padega aur see ki kya it is all about.
Mujhe lagta hai tumhe onscreen adaption pasand aayegi. Isme witty animation aur intelligent dialogue hai. Isme animation content se paired hai to ye tumhe or your children ke liye perfect hoga.
Ye to great sunai padta hai! Mujhe lagta hai main apanee dhanyavaad ka kaam kiya hoon aur mujhe aapake samay aur dhanyavaad shubh ho. Aapka din great ho!

now agar mujhe sirf ye move forward karne ke liye mil sakta hai to main apna task finish karega aur is movie ko watch karunga.
Movie kon banaya hai?
Movie ke liye aur information hai. Dragons kabhi bhi livestock churate hain, to waise bhi warriors hain dragons se fight karte hain. Instead, main character hiccup dragon ko maar sakta hai jo hurt hai, to wo use free kar deta hai.
ye Dreamworks animation film hai aur directors Chris Sanders aur Dean DeBiois hain.
mujhe Dreamworks movies usually pasand hai, definitely ab dekhni hogi.
isme Rotten Tomatoes ka score 98% hai aur CinemaScore ka score A hai. Ye definitely has great ratings hai.
kya aap ko kuch voice actors ke baare mein jaana chahiye?
Rotten Tomatoes unki ratings pe kafi spot on hai usually!
Han, please mujhe kuch voice actors ki saath me indulge karenge
acha Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera, aur Jay Baruchel is movie mein amazing voice actors hain.

Hiccup ek prosthetic banata hai jahaan dragon ko maar sakta hai. Use captive dragons ko training karne ke liye learn kar raha hai.

Movie ka title
The Imitation Game
ye kis baare mein hai?
well ye ek historical movie hai jisme kafi drama hai
kis time period me se ye placed ho gaya hai?
The Imitation Game is a 2014 ki American historical drama film hai Morten Tyldum ne direct kiya aur Graham Moore ne write kiya, loosely based on the biography Alan Turing: The Enigma by Andrew Hodges (jo previously stage play and BBC drama Breaking the Code me adapt kiya tha) , real-life British cryptanalyst Alan Turing ka role hai, jisne German intelligence codes ko decrypt kia British government ke liye during the Second World War. Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear, Charles Dance aur Mark Strong bhi star hain.

yah ek specific target ke baare mein hai, haalaanki yah technology corporate espionage ke liye hai, aur mono character ke liye bilkul involve hota hai.
ok movie duniya me lee gayi hai ya dreams me?
isme Maurice Fischer ki competitor ke liye energy conglomerate ko breakup karna chahta hai, Saito ko Cobb ne convince kiya Fischer ki son aur heir, Robert, apni father ki company ko dissolve karna.
leonardo kaun play karta hai?
ye duniya aur dream worlds me hoti hai. time pe follow karna mushkil hai lekin uski first dream level LA me hai.
Leonardo DiCaprio play karta hai Dom Cobb, ek professional thief jo apne victims ko conning secrets infiltrate karte hai dreams mein infiltrate karte hai
kya ve dream to dream se multiple logo ki dream me jump kar sakte hai ya kisi ke sapna hai
iske dream level mein, person jo dream generating ho raha tha wo apne sleeping team members ko kick set up karta hai jo apne sleeping team members ko awaken kar dene ke liye use kiye hai, to kahi logo involved hai.
to paatron ko dhyaan hai ki ve sapno ke liye deeper jaane ke liye hai?

kya is movies mein guns involved hein?

Ye movie ka first key scene hai As a child, Bruce Wayne ek dry well mein gir jata hai aur ek swarm of bats se attack kiya jata hai, subsequently phobia develop ho jata hai creatures se. Ek time us parents Thomas aur Martha ke saath dekhne mein, Bruce bats ke roop mein frighte ho jata hai aur usse leave karna chahta hai. Outside mein, mugger Joe Chill Bruce ke parents ko murder kar deta hai. Orphaned, Bruce is raised by the family butler, Alfred Pennyworth.
oh koi bhi sad nahi
Mujhe dil tobi hai
Wo second key scene hai Fourteen saal ka baad, Chill ko free kar diya aur Gotham City k mafia boss Carmine Falcone k liye testify karne ke liye. Bruce Chill ko murder karne ki intent karta hai, but Falcone ka assassins Falcone se pehla assassins kar deta hai. Bruce ka childhood friend, assistant district attorney Rachel Dawes, berates hi m justice system ko undermine karne ki attempts ki, bolati hai uske father shame ho jata hai. Bruce Falcone ko confront karta hai, aur unconscious Ducard ko save karta hai.
oh wow interesting lagta hai mujhe lagta hai tum mujhe sell kar diya
kya maine mention kiya ki isme Michael Caine hai?
nahi tumne nahi kiya, ab main iske liye hun
Ye scene #3 hai Batman ne uske paas drug shipment ko accept kiya, Rachel ko uske paas Falcone ko chhod deta hai, aur Sergeant James Gordon ko Gotham mein chhod deta hai, jo ek sahi cop hai use arrest karne ke liye. Jail me, Falcone Dr. Jonathan Crane se meet karta hai, ek corrupt psychiatrist jise usne Gotham ke paas drugs lene ki koshish kiya hai aur use ek khatre- inducing hallucinogen deta hai jisme Falcone ko khush kar deta hai. Batman ne "the Scarecrow" ko investigate kiya aur uske paas incapacitated ho jata hai. Alfred ne uske paas save kiya aur Alfred ne use antidote bana diya. Jab Rachel ko accuse kiya, Crane reveal karta hai ki usne Gotham ke water supply mein uska drugs lene ki. Bruce ka birthday party me ducard aati hai aur usne sahi Ra's al Ghul ko reveal kiya. Wayne Manor ko aflame deta hai aur Bruce ko mar jata hai, but Alfred use rescue karta hai.
bahut descriptive, mujhe achhi lagta hai is movie ka sound
scene 4 tab hai jub Katie Holmes capture ho jata hai aur evil imposter Maggie Gyllenhaal se replace kiya gaya
muje voh aise hi lagtha hein, maggie toh ew hein

mujhe achcha laga ki isey Rotten Tomatoes mein 96% milee
Ye 1963 mein, teenaged Frank Abagnale hai New Rochelle, New York mein uski father Frank Abagnale, Sr. aur French mother Paula ke saath rahta hai. Jab Frank Sr. ko Chase Manhattan Bank mein business loan ko denied kiya unknown difficulties se IRS ke liye, family is forced to move from their large home to a small apartment. Paula ko Jack, a friend of her husband. Meanwhile, Frank ek French class mein pose karta hai. Frank ki parents divorce karte hai, aur Frank bhag jata hai. Jab wo money runs out hua, wo begins relying on confidence scams to get by. Soon, Frank ki cons increase karta hai aur wo airline ka pilot bhi impersonata hai. Wo Pan Am payroll checks ko $2.8 million churata hai.
Nice plot right? Frank ke roop me Leonardo DiCarpio ke rup me kya sochte ho?
so good. mujhe pasand hai jab wo Barry Allen ko ek alias banata hai
aur tom hanks as carl hanratty.. kya phenom hein
mein maantha hoon.. badiya cast hein kyon ki voh ache movie hein

mera movie Zootopia hai. Isme Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, and Jenny Slate hain.
ye kis baare mein hai?
Ye ek animated movie hai Zootopia ke city mein jindaare different animals ke bare mein. Main character ek police officer hai.
plot kya hai, kuch type ki conflict hai?
Judy Hopps ek nayi officer hai, jisko Chief ke liye khud prove krna chahiye. Uske sath kuch conflict hai Fox con artists ke saath.
kya koee paatr hain?
ye do main characters hai Judy the rabbit aur Nick the fox. There is the police chief, Chief Bogo, jo ek buffalo hai aur mayor, Dawn Bellwether, jo ek sheep hai

John learn karta hai Viggo ki son Iosef nightclub me Viggo ki tarah protected hai. John club me enter karta hai aur Iosef ko chhod deta hai, but Viggo ki henchman Kirill ne John ko escape karne ke liye force kar deta hai, allowing Iosef to escape. John retreats to a hotel--the Continental, jo criminal underworld ko treat karta hai. There usne assassin ko meet kiya, but John ko ek former friend se alert kiya. Usne assassin ko subdues kiya aur Viggo ki business ko reveal kar deta hai.
In ek aur scene mein, John Little Russia mein church jaata hai jo Viggo ki front banata hai aur usne dramatically Viggo ki cache ko destroy kar deta hai aur blackmail ki material ko blackmat kiya. Jab Viggo aati hai, John unko dar jaata hai, but subdued aur captured kiya jata hai. Viggo ne John ko maarata hai, but John ko maarata hai. Uski old friend Marcus intervenes again, allowing Wick to free himself, kill the henchman, aur Viggo ko son ka location reveal karne k liye. John "safe house" jaata hai aur Iosef ko maarata hai.

Main accha kar raha hoon.
Main movie ke baare soch raha hun jisme true story ki basis hai aur Frank Abagnale ki life ko portray karti hai.
isme Leonardo DiCaprio aur Tom Hanks starred hain
mainne usi kabhi nahin suna, usne ek living ke liye kya kiya?
Movie ka naam Catch Me If You Can hai
kya tumne dekha hai? Rotten Tomatoes main bahut ache reviews mili hai.
maine nahi dekhi, ye kis baare mein hai?
Ye ek ajeeb Frank Abagnale ke baare mein hai (played by DiCaprio) jo ek con man hai primarily through fraud.
iski trail mein detective Carl Hanratty (Tom Hanks) jo ki world ko chase karta hai, thus title Catch Me If You Can.
Oh interesting sound karta he.Movie kis saal aaee?
Movie was released in 2002 and puri review sites pe kafi achi thi
Kya woh gang ka part hai ya woh apni own me crimes commit karta hai?
voh apni own hein aur voh fraud karthe throughout uska teen years
voh successfully pilot, a doctor, parish ka character impersonated kiya aur end mein jab voh caught ho gaya tho FBI ke liye kaam kar raha tha
interesting lag raha hai
haan, uska impersonation Pan Am ke pilot ka hein, aur usse $2.8 million nikhla
ye NY me based hai
Movie kitni lambi hai?
haan, iske baare mein, movie thoda lambi hai 2.5 ghante par overall muje lagtha hein ki yeh must see hein
ye bahut bad nahi hai. Kya tumhe entertained karne ke liye kafi action hai?
nahi action par storyline tho aapko interesting hein
kya is movie ke baare mein kuchh aur patha hein?
Frank Abagnale ko ek scene mein catch kiya jahan detectives are extraditing him back to the US by plane. Abagnale plane mein bathroom use karne jaata hai aur escapes karne jaata hai.
sach mein, carl ko usse catch kar dethe aur frank tho apne aap ko giveup karthe aur usse sentenced kiya jail mein
Aur ye true story pe based hai?
Carl occasionally usake paas visit karta hai aur uske saath evidence pe review karke, Frank Carl ke saath FBI ke saath kaam karke rehta hai.
haan, yeh true story ke based hein, lekin shayad unhone kuch parts ko dramatize kiya
koi sawal?
mujhe lagata hai ki ye sab ke lie achchha movie hai.

Hello, kya tumne The Imitation Game dekhi hai? Wo stories last century mein sabse important hai
maine nahi dekhi
film ka genre kya hai?
yah itihaasik hai, elan tyooring ke jeevan ke bare mei.
kis saal aaee?
Ye mool roop se 2014 mein ayi thi.
kya aap kuch actors ke baare mein kuch bata sakate hain?
Ye Benedict Cumberbatch as the real life British cryptanalyst Alan Turing ko star karti hai. Ye Keira Knightly, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear, Charles Dance, and Mark Strong bhi hai
Kisne lambe hai?
Mujhe nahi pata uska lamba hai, but Rotten Tomatoes ne 91% rating diya, aur CinemaScore ne A+ diya.
Mujhe plot/Alan Turing ke bare me kya bata sakte ho?
Alan Turing ne German intelligence codes ko decrypted kiya British Government ke liye during the Second World War.isne uski life ka story batati hai jab wo ek boy tha boarding school mein jo 1927 me tha, aur kaise us time me cryptography me interest develop kiye. phir yeh batati hai kaise british ko help kar rahe the jab they declared war on Germany in 1939. yeh 1951 mein start hota hai, aur ek aur older Turing telling his life ka story.
kya rating hai MPAA rating?
mujhe nahin pata.
Probably PG-13 ho sakti hai, I bet
